personSummary:
I wanted to play 3rd base for the San Francisco Giants when I was little. When I realized that was definitely not going to happen, my path to figure out what I wanted to do in my career started. I struggled to find my path.

Through an unlikely chain of events, I ended up working in a profession where I do exactly what I always struggled with - helping people figure out the next steps in their careers and helping build companies. I find what I do extremely satisfying. I care about getting people excited about the next phase of their careers and hiring the people who can make a company special.

My career journey has not been linear, but I've been able to hone my skills into a career that I'm passionate about. I value transparency, excitement, honesty, and a great candidate experience in my profession. At the end of the day, it helps put that extremely complex hiring puzzle together.

Jim pioneered legal recruitment in the Northeast. When he founded Bostonian in August 1978, it became the first company in New England dedicated exclusively to the recruitment and placement of attorneys. Today, Bostonian has grown into an international attorney recruitment and placement firm.

In addition to working with individual attorneys, Jim and the Bostonian team have helped law firms expand by adding practice groups as well as through mergers and acquisitions.

Jim is a founding member and former President of the National Association of Legal Search Consultants (NALSC), the only trade association for the attorney placement industry. He served on the NALSC Board of Directors for ten years, during which he chaired and contributed to numerous committees.

Beyond his professional contributions, Jim has served on the Board of Directors of Big Brothers and Sisters of America, Boston. His dedication to service is further reflected in his time as a U.S. Army veteran, serving on the DMZ in Korea‚Äîa testament to his commitment, character, and values.

Jim and his wife of 53 years, Barbara, live in Marshfield Hills, Massachusetts. They are proud parents of four grown children and grandparents to seven.

Who I Serve:
As Vice President at Frontline Source Group, I partner with organizations that understand the critical connection between talent acquisition excellence and business performance. My clients span diverse industries, encompassing mid-market growth companies and established enterprises seeking a strategic approach to workforce development. These organizations typically require sophisticated talent solutions that align with their unique operational challenges, growth trajectories, and competitive market positions.
The Problem I Solve:
Today's organizations face multifaceted talent acquisition challenges that traditional recruitment approaches fail to address effectively. These include prolonged position vacancies that impact operational continuity, candidates lacking essential qualifications or cultural alignment, and inefficient recruitment processes. These challenges directly affect productivity, innovation capacity, and ultimately, market competitiveness.
My Unique Approach
With my extensive experience in staffing leadership at Frontline Source Group, I deliver exceptional recruitment outcomes through:
‚Ä¢	Consultative partnership that begins with understanding your comprehensive business objectives rather than isolated staffing requirements
‚Ä¢	Customized talent acquisition strategies designed specifically for your organizational structure, culture, and industry demands
‚Ä¢	Advanced candidate evaluation methodologies that assess both technical capabilities and cultural alignment factors
‚Ä¢	Streamlined recruitment processes that respect the timeo f hiring managers while maintaining thorough candidate assessment
‚Ä¢	Continuous market intelligence providing valuable insights on competitive compensation structures and emerging talent trends
‚Ä¢	Strategic workforce planning that anticipates future talent requirements based on your organization's growth objectives

Organizations that engage my services consistently experience improvements in key performance indicators, including accelerated time-to-hire metrics, enhanced candidate quality, increased retention rates, and improved overall workforce performance. Connect with me to discuss how we can develop a comprehensive talent strategy that addresses your specific business challenges and delivers a meaningful return on your recruitment investment.

personTitleDescription:
For over 25 years, I‚Äôve led Joseph Chris Partners, one of the most respected executive search firms in the real estate development, construction, infrastructure, and private equity sectors. We are respected because I have a team who shows up in the best interest of everyone we work with!  As CEO, I drive our firm‚Äôs strategic vision, lead high-stakes searches for leadership talent, and partner with clients nationwide to build executive teams that move markets.

Core Executive Search Functions:
-Retained Search Leadership: Lead C-suite, VP, and Director-level searches across real estate development, commercial construction, multifamily, industrial, and homebuilding sectors.

-Talent Mapping & Succession Planning: Advise executive teams and boards on leadership bench strength, internal succession, and organizational scaling.

-Private Equity Portfolio Support: Partner with PE firms to build high-performing executive teams in real estate portfolio companies.

-Candidate Assessment & Culture Fit: Combine deep industry insight, behavioral analysis, and high EQ to ensure long-term success‚Äînot just placement.

-Confidential & Strategic Hires: Trusted advisor for discreet leadership transitions, executive replacements, and organizational transformations.

Leadership & Business Strategy:
-Scaled Joseph Chris Partners into a Forbes-ranked executive search firm, recognized multiple times as one of America‚Äôs Best Executive Recruiting Firms.

-Named Best Family-Owned Business by the Houston Business Journal, reflecting a legacy of integrity, excellence, and people-first leadership.

-Developed internal training programs to cultivate next-generation recruiters and institutionalize industry-specific expertise.

-Built a collaborative, knowledge-sharing team model that leverages nearly 100 years of collective recruiting experience.

-Drive content strategy, brand positioning, and thought leadership to elevate firm visibility and inbound business.
personSummary:
I‚Äôve raced Ironmans, climbed Mount Kilimanjaro, and worked with attack dogs. You learn a lot from those things: grit, discipline, and how to push through when it gets hard. That same mindset drives how I lead, recruit, and build teams.

As President & CEO of Joseph Chris Partners, I‚Äôve spent over 25 years helping real estate development, construction, infrastructure, and private equity firms hire game-changing leaders‚Äîfrom senior VPs to Presidents and CEOs. I don‚Äôt just fill jobs. I build leadership pipelines, transform companies, and create real impact through relationships that last.

My firm has been around for nearly 50 years. We‚Äôve been ranked by Forbes as one of America‚Äôs Best Executive Search Firms and recognized by the Houston Business Journal as a top family-owned business. That doesn‚Äôt happen by accident. It comes from doing things the right way: with honesty, respect, and relentless curiosity.

What Makes My Approach Different?
I don‚Äôt throw resumes. I connect dots. I listen, challenge assumptions, and think long-term‚Äîfor both the client and the candidate.

I don‚Äôt oversell. If it‚Äôs not a fit, I‚Äôll tell you. If it is, I‚Äôll fight for it.

I‚Äôve been inside boardrooms and boots-on-the-ground job sites. I understand what leaders really need‚Äînot just on paper, but in the field.

Whether you‚Äôre building out a new region, planning a succession strategy, or trying to find someone who can scale your organization‚Äîyou want someone who gets it, and who‚Äôs done it before.

That‚Äôs where I come in.

Specialties:
Executive Search | Construction & Development Talent Acquisition | Real Estate Leadership Recruiting | Succession Planning | Retained Search | Team Building | Private Equity PortCos | Infrastructure | CRE | Multifamily | Homebuilding | Industrial | Real Estate Investment | Recruiting Strategy | National & Regional Expansion

personSummary:
The hiring challenge that businesses face when it comes to recruiting is the lack of time, technology, tools, or bandwidth to identify the right talent for an open position.  The risks of passing on qualified impact candidates and wasting time interviewing the wrong candidates lengthens the time to hire, costing the company significantly.

Here is what every hiring manager should know when filling a position: 


1. What is the cost of the open role to the organization?
2. How to communicate the WHY of your organization, so that top talent would consider exploring the option to work with you
3. Have an interview and hiring roadmap in place so that you present the job consistently to all candidates to keep them engaged and interested
4. Know what job flexibility is required to fill the open position and when contract or direct hire is the best solution

Consistent reinforcement of these four activities will maximize hiring so that you and your team will see measurable results.

Lloyd Staffing partners with companies to help fill critical positions so companies can get back to business!  Whether you need flexible contract/temporary talent or a direct hire ‚Äì our innovation, systems and interview expertise takes the burden off of you. 

If your organization is challenged with time and bandwidth to fill pivotal roles, let‚Äôs have a conversation.  Whether or not we decide to work together, I will share hiring and interviewing insights that can have a significant impact on your business and talent outcomes. 

mmatos@lloydstaffing.com | 954-487-1002

CPA‚Äôs and he started in Audit with the  NYS Department of Audit and Control. Murray is a graduate of Pace University and also holds a Masters Degree in Psychoanalysis from The New York Graduate School of Psychoanalysis. Neill Marshall  has almost 30 years of experience in healthcare search and has been involved in over 600 hundred senior level assignments. He‚Äôs held leadership roles with major executive search firms and in 2017 helped co-found and is currently a partner in HealthSearch Partners the fifth largest healthcare executive search entity in the U.S.

HealthSearch Partners is the combination of CES Partners, FaithSearch Partners and Southerland Partners, creating a unique platform to provide a better executive search product.

In 2014, Marshall joined Southerland Partners, an executive search firm specializing in recruiting leaders for hospitals and other healthcare organizations. Southerland Partners conducted 80 projects, 12 Chief Executive Officer, including the Chief Executive Officer searches for both Intermountain Health Care and Baptist Health in Louisville, 7 Chief Operating Officer, 9 Chief Financial Officer and numerous other executive level projects.

In 2005, Marshall founded Marshall Koll & Associates, an executive search firm specializing in recruiting leaders for healthcare organizations. In 12 years, they conducted 150 projects for their hospital clients.

Prior to Marshall Koll, Neill was a senior consultant with Witt/Kieffer in Dallas. Witt/Kieffer is the largest executive search firm in the U.S. specializing in healthcare and higher education. At the firm, he was responsible for executive search assignments for client organizations and received the firms Quality Award in 2004. While there he was involved in over 350 senior level assignments, including 50 for CEO.

personSummary:
30 years of Sales and Marketing experience as a National Sales Manager with a California based manufacturer, Latin America Sales Manager for a multi-national corporation and for the past nineteen years he has lead Staffing Solutions as the C.E.O. Currently I serve as the Chairman of the California Staffing Professionals Political Action Committee which represents over 2,000 staffing agencies in California. Our committee is trying to give a political voice to our industry by directly engaging in elections and contributing to the campaigns of candidates who are pro-business and support the staffing industry. For staffing and non-staffing businesses to survive in California we must have a say in who gets elected in Sacramento and your PAC dollars go to that purpose. 

For almost twenty years Staffing Solutions has been helping companies in the Southern California market find top talent for their businesses. With offices in both Los Angeles and Orange counties. I am proud to inform new clients that Staffing Solutions has been working with many of our existing clients for five, ten, fifteen and some nearly 20 consecutive years. Our areas of specialty range from the Food and Beverage, Aerospace, Medical, Dental industries, Distribution, Advance Manufacturing, Clerical, Administration, Technical and Professional placements.

As a successful Hispanic small business owner of nineteen years, I have been on television with Univision, Fox 11 News, featured on national commercials in English and Spanish and I have been interviewed on national radio and cable programs. 

For almost 40 years I have served on non-profit boards and commissions, and currently I serve on five boards. Some past and present boards are; YMCA of Orange County, City of Santa Ana Commissioner, Goodwill Industries of Orange County/Landmark Services Chairman, California Staffing Professionals State Board, New Majority of Orange County, Santa Ana College Foundation, Orange County Youth Sports Foundation, Hispanic 100 organization, The Toll Roads of Orange County Hispanic Advisory Board and the South Coast Global Medical Center Board.

I have been in the healthcare staffing space, mainly focused on physician and locum tenens, for over 20 years. During this time, I have had the privilege of being part of remarkable teams, guiding two separate locum tenens firms from startup to high-growth stages. All Star Healthcare Solutions has been the true highlight of my professional life. Co-founding the locums organization with two other incredible partners, and later adding key members of our now-executive team, has propelled us to industry-leading growth. With the perfect blend of culture and execution, our organization is now among the top 5-7 locum tenens firms nationwide in terms of revenue, and we're only continuing to grow.

A significant milestone in our journey was our recent transaction and partnership with Knox Lane, which has further strengthened our capabilities and growth potential.

Involved in start-ups, I have had the opportunity to touch and develop nearly every aspect of the sales and operational sides of the business. However, my greatest joy comes from seeing others grow into roles that help the organization thrive, while also fulfilling their own career paths. I believe in a leadership style best described by Lao Tzu: ‚ÄúA leader is best when people barely know he exists; when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.‚Äù

This industry has given so much to me, my organization, and communities across the country. As a way to give back, I served on the Board of Directors and as the President of the National Association of Locum Tenens Organizations (NALTO). Additionally, I volunteer as the Chair of the Legislative Committee and serve on the Membership and Ethics Committees. I also sit on the board of YPO Palm Beach and work with budding entrepreneurs on start-ups in multiple industries, including technology, hospitality, commercial and residential real estate, and construction. Furthermore, I serve as a board member on start-ups in these various industries, helping to guide and support their growth and development.

Please feel free to contact me with any industry-related questions at myoung@asrlocums.com.

Euris conducts senior-level searches for public and private colleges and universities (both majority institutions and HBCUs), foundations, and a wide range of not-for-profit organizations.  Among her placements are presidents, provosts, chief academic officers, chief information officers, chief diversity officers and deans of colleges and universities; and CEOs, presidents and executive directors of not-for-profit organizations.  

Additionally, Euris partners with corporate clients in the areas of diversity recruitment, on-boarding and retention of senior management and emerging leaders.  Her search experience spans multiple functional disciplines and she has successfully assisted her clients in placing diverse candidates in various positions including finance, human resources, legal, information technology, as well as diversity practitioners.  

Prior to joining Heidrick & Struggles, Euris was CEO of a specialty retained search firm in Atlanta that focused on middle- to upper-management positions across multiple industries and functional disciplines.  Earlier in her career, she was a vice president with a major money center bank now merged with JPMorgan Chase and project manager for a systems integration, training and software consulting company.  She began her career in the Management Information Consulting Division of Arthur Andersen & Company (now Accenture) where she participated in the design and implementation of large-scale marketing, distribution and hospital information systems.

Driving Innovation at the Crossroads of AI, Cybersecurity, Engineering & Human Health

I‚Äôm a seasoned executive and strategic connector with over two decades of experience in technology and innovation staffing‚Äînow stepping boldly into the future of AI, Robotics, Cybersecurity, and Advanced Engineering.
Currently deepening my expertise in artificial intelligence, I‚Äôm committed to becoming a Subject Matter Expert (SMRE) in these frontier technologies. personSummary:
Tech-forward sales leader + innovation pathfinder focused on AI, cybersecurity, robotics, and human health. With 20+ years in talent strategy, I now operate at the crossroads of emerging tech and real-world impact. I help companies grow with purpose‚Äîwhere code meets care. Let‚Äôs build what‚Äôs next, together.

I started in the technical staffing industry on a whim because I had finished college and was not quite sure of my next step in life. I was taken in by a great company initially,  New Boston Systems,  at the very beginning of what  would become a successful career as an IT Staffing Specialist. I have over 15  years of IT Staffing experience in the Bay Area. I started in the Dot.com Boom as a Technical Recruiter primarily focused on placing application developers with an expertise in Java Development while at New Boston Systems. I interfaced mostly with Fortune 500 clients like Wells Fargo Bank, Charles Schwab, Bank of America and Visa International. I always believed that I had the extra ability to find top IT Talent and lead and mentor teams of recruiters. When I was at TEKsystems, I advanced my career by stepping up to train and mentor junior IT Recruiters. I was still a top producer and a President's Club winner but wanted to help my team mates and teach them how to better advance their careers. I joined Mainz Brady Group in the summer of 2006 where I was fortunate enough to become a Senior Staffing Manager with a very elite group of other Senior Recruiters and Account Managers. I spent the first year as a Senior Recruiter and then  then wanted to help Eric Brady and Richard Mainz grow their organization so I jumped into a Senior Account Manager Role and basically pounded the pavement to bring in new business on a daily basis. I worked very hard at building a network of candidates and clients that I continue to do business with today. I am a 10 time President's Club winner and the Top Producer in the Bay Area region. I eventually evolved into a role of a Selling Branch Manager where I led a team of recruiters and sales folks as well as had to produce and maintain my own book of business simultaneously. I love leading and selling and I work daily to strive for a great balance of servicing my clients and training my team members.

In 1991, after several years of recruiting ‚ÄúBig 8‚Äù CPAs, I started my own firm, Marcus & Associates, to satisfy what I perceived to be the integrity and relationship building void in the accounting recruitment space.  Through perseverance and a commitment to excellence, I believe I have met that goal, with relationships on the both the candidate and client side spanning a 30 year period.

Marcus & Associates has a solid history of placing accounting and finance professionals in financial reporting, accounting policy, internal audit, financial and strategic planning & analysis, business development, risk and treasury positions throughout the New York/New Jersey/Connecticut tri-state area. Our candidates range in salary from $75,000 to $750,000; from Senior Accountant to CFO. In addition to our widespread MBA networks, we have a strong recruiting effort within the Big 4 accounting firms and have an excellent track record in filling positions requiring CPAs with Big 4 or Big 4 plus private industry experience.

At Marcus & Associates, we have built our reputation for integrity and effectiveness by applying a professional and personal approach to recruiting.  We believe in taking the time to understand our clients‚Äô environment and culture in addition to the specific technical requirements for each position. By utilizing our extensive database and professional networks, we consistently present our clients with premiere candidates who have been targeted, recruited and presented strictly based on their qualifications, reputations and references.  We carefully screen each candidate and will never bombard our clients with unnecessary paperwork of unqualified candidates.

companyDescription:
At Hueman, people are our passion.

Our mission is simple: we connect the right people to the right job at the right time. People are what drive business forward. And people are the heart of any company‚Äîespecially ours. So our main focus is to help people find the right job, and help companies find the right people. And we‚Äôve found the perfect way to do just that‚ÄîHueman to human.

Using our cultural-based hiring model, we match people with positions and companies, creating a successful employee experience and hiring process for our colleagues, clients and candidates‚Äîbecause the most important thing in business isn‚Äôt what your company does; it‚Äôs who your company is.

With a name like Hueman, it should come as no surprise that we‚Äôre a company based on people‚Äîstarting with our very own. Previously a part of PPR Talent Management Group, Hueman was established by a core leadership team who saw an opportunity to expand their cultural-focused recruiting models. However, we aren‚Äôt the typical recruiting partner who views hiring as an administrative function or a headcount. Instead, we look beyond the metrics, and recognize the person; the individual. We look for heart, creativity, passion and character, and when we see it, we hire it.

We are Hueman‚Äîin every sense of the word.

personSummary:
My true passion is working with people.   The only jobs I‚Äôve ever had involved people and service and I can‚Äôt imagine a career that didn‚Äôt involve the two.  At Eikon Consulting Group, I have the pleasure and benefit of helping great clients find great talent and bringing the two together. 

The things I whole heartedly believe in are honesty, integrity and doing the right thing.  It‚Äôs these core beliefs that are the foundation of Eikon Consulting Group and the reason why I launched the firm.  The same core beliefs are also the reason that I think people enjoy working with me.  Whether you are the talent looking for the next advancement in your career or the client looking to solve a business challenge, I‚Äôm passionate about bringing the two together and knowing I made a difference and helped two parties achieve their ultimate goals.

When I‚Äôm not at work, my kids is where I spend my time.  I have three children...two boys and a girl.  My oldest son started asking for a sibling when he was 7.  His desire for a sibling led the family down the adoption path...and China is where my little angel was born.  A process that generally takes 12-18 months ended up taking nearly 6 years.  Several years into the adoption process, and what I thought would take another 4 years to complete, my second son was born.  God probably had a big grin on his face when he showed me that the age difference was only 2 months apart.  ÔÅä  Life is good!

personTitleDescription:
Lead a portfolio of healthcare staffing organizations focused on building sustainable, people-first workforce solutions that support both healthcare systems and clinicians. Redefine traditional staffing models through long-term strategy, innovative and localized operations, and values-driven leadership.

Key responsibilities:
-Set vision and strategy, rooted in partner trust and clinician advocacy
-Guide scalable staffing models tailored to community needs
-Align business growth with mission-driven impact
-Reduce partner reliance on short-term, transactional staffing
-Integrate tech to streamline operations‚Äîwithout losing the human touch

Olaro is a company of unified brands privately funded by Proeza, a portfolio management company composed of purpose-driven businesses committed to a more prosperous and harmonious tomorrow.
personSummary:
I didn‚Äôt set out to become a CEO ‚Äî I stepped up because the healthcare staffing industry needs to change. Too many hospitals are struggling with traditional models that don‚Äôt serve them or their patients. That, combined with an increasing scarcity of clinicians, leads to decision-making that places profit over people. As a result, clinicians are made to feel like they are commodities. That‚Äôs not healthcare. And that‚Äôs not sustainable.

At PHHI, we‚Äôre building something different: a people-first, tech-enabled, and partnership-driven model that helps hospitals and clinicians thrive together. I lead with a core belief: healthcare is personal ‚Äî so workforce strategy should be too.

 We don't fill shifts. We build relationships. We are stewards of those we serve.  We support clinicians beyond placement. We help healthcare systems create sustainable staffing models, especially in overlooked communities where workforce instability threatens care quality. And we do it transparently ‚Äî because trust is the foundation of everything we build.

As we reimagine healthcare staffing, I‚Äôm focused on:

‚Ä¢ Driving long-term viability over short-term fixes
‚Ä¢ Helping hospitals reduce reliance on transactional staffing
‚Ä¢ Creating clinician-first models grounded in respect and readiness
‚Ä¢ Using tech to enhance, not replace, the human connection
‚Ä¢ Building scalable and culturally aligned workforce solutions

The future of healthcare staffing will belong to those bold enough to reject outdated norms, put people at the center, and lead with trust. That‚Äôs the future I'm building.

personTitleDescription:
Trust and integrity are the foundation of our name, our company, and how we serve our candidates and clients. We perform nationwide executive searches to find just the right leader. We are also committed to our business partners by placing accounting, finance, tax, and HR talent on a contingent, retained, temporary or consulting basis. Our team has the experience to truly listen to and understand your needs then deliver the results you‚Äôre looking for. Give us a call today and let us help you succeed.

To really make a difference in this profession we must provide better service and insight with a stronger set of core values that drive how we do our jobs. That‚Äôs why we focus on building long-term relationships based on trust and superior client service. Every day, we strive to deliver the highest level of satisfaction to the candidates we place in permanent and temporary positions.

I am a leader of Truity Partners and our Executive Search practice. While I love working with our Executive Search clients, candidates and team, I also have the opportunity to help support the growth of our business in the Madison and Appleton markets and I'm passionate about hiring great people to join our team.
personSummary:
I‚Äôve been building trust in the recruitment business for over 25 years by making and keeping one promise at a time. Trust is built by doing what you say you‚Äôre going to do and by doing the right thing for your clients and candidates every time ‚Äì even when no one is watching. 

I knew right away that this career was a perfect fit and I‚Äôve never looked back. I love it here. I love learning about companies and their needs, getting to know candidates and their stories, and then matching the two of them up so that both parties have what they want. I feel fortunate that I work in a career that I love and that I'm part of a collaborative, supportive and fun team of passionate professionals. This is my career. I‚Äôm not in it for one transaction or a quick placement. Everything I do today is with the intention of building lasting relationships and trust down the road.

I‚Äôve learned a lot during the years I‚Äôve spent in this profession. Here‚Äôs what I believe:

‚Ä¢ Long-term relationships are essential.

‚Ä¢ Do the right thing every day and it‚Äôll pay off in the long run.

‚Ä¢ Always take the high road. Period.

‚Ä¢ Confidentiality is critical. Our business hinges on the fact that our clients and candidates are willing to talk to us. If they tell us something confidential, we treat it that way.

If you are interested in learning more about how I can help you, please message me on Linked In or contact me at kim.herlitzka@truitypartners.com or 608.240.2540.

personTitleDescription:
Joseph Barry Hasenkopf (Barry), Chief Executive Officer, has 30 years of experience as an executive consultant across multiple industries, cultures, and geographies. A proven leader, he is committed to the growth, education, and enrichment of his clients at every level of their career. Over his career he has assisted some of the largest global professional consulting firms in the world, including Ernst & Young, Capgemini, HP, IBM, and Tata Consulting.

Mr. Hasenkopf has taught leadership, communication, and relationship skills to business students in Georgia State University, J. Mack Robinson College of Business. His academic experience includes working with professors and department chairs as an adjunct professor to prepare and deliver a successful enterprise business process curriculum within the Information Systems, Master of Science degree program.

As an executive of Myers McRae, he is committed to continuing the strategic direction and quality services that has earned the firm national recognition. The editors and analysts at Hunt Scanlon Media continue to name Myers McRae as one of the "Top 50 Education / Non-Profit Search Firms" in a special edition of Executive Search Review. The company stated the selected firms are considered the most prominent trailblazers in education and non-profit searches.

Mr. Hasenkopf holds a Bachelor of Science degree in computer science with a minor in mathematics and Russian from Edinboro University of Pennsylvania (now PennWest Edinboro). He received his Master of Business Administration degree with a concentration in finance at the University of Pittsburgh, Joseph M. Katz Graduate School of Business.

personSummary:
Paul has earned his reputation as the Headhunter serving innovative entrepreneurs and venture capitalists in Silicon Valley and Silicon Alley. Daversa Partners is notorious for assembling the most impactful leaderships teams for the most important companies in technology.

Daversa Partners coined a phrase a decade ago to describe the pursuit of executives that could create so much value that the cost of not landing them was more than the cost to land them. I call them "Material Impact Executives". They are easy to find -nearly impossible to convince to leave. I focus on Headhunting those executives. 

I have been hired by the Founders, CEO's and Boards to build the leadership teams for MongoDB,Uber, Brex, Dataminr, Block, AirTable, Instacart,DocuSign,DoorDash, and Reddit.

 In addition to this list of disruptive companies is the current hunt for talent for the great start-ups you have never heard of that will emerge as the next generation of leaders and innovators.

personSummary:
‚ñ∫ Website: www.conexusrecruiting.com

Prior to merging with Conexus, Colleen was co-founder and partner at Citadel.  With over 20 years of business knowledge, her deep understanding of organizational dynamics and process in small to large company environments provides strategic direction and long-term success to the businesses we serve.

She began her career as Controller of a consumer products company, overseeing Accounting, Technology and Human Resources functions that successfully navigated the business through rapid growth for many years.

She then took on a leadership role with an international, publicly held, multi-billion-dollar firm specializing in accounting and finance consulting, guiding them in the opening of new offices and divisions, always working side by side with the clients in the region as well as turnaround specialists for struggling business units.

She served as Orange County Director of Client Services for Tatum LLC, which was a national firm focused on services around the office of the CFO and CIO.

After Tatum was sold to a strategic buyer, Colleen jumped into a startup and was one of the founders of Beacon Resources, which specialized in accounting and finance consulting and placement.  Beacon quickly grew to be one of the fastest growing management companies in Orange County, according to the Orange County Business Journal for four years running and was later successfully sold to Gryphon Investors/DLC.

FPC (F-O-R-T-U-N-E Personnel Consultants) is a network of over 60 executive search offices operated by industry specialists. companyDescription:
Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization responsible for the planning, programming, and promotion of the Riverwalk District.  We pursue our mission, ‚Äúto be the catalyst in building and nurturing Riverwalk and the Riverwalk District as a vibrant community connected by the New River‚Äù, through a range of fundraising, events and advocacy, and by providing valuable information through our website, Go Riverwalk Magazine and social media.

Riverwalk produces annual signature events such as the Stone Crab and Seafood Festival, Burger Battle‚Ñ¢, and Chili Cookoff that draw tens of thousands of people to the City of Fort Lauderdale‚Äôs downtown, as well as the annual Riverwalk Tribute that honors a member of the community for their exceptional accomplishments.  The Riverwalk Signature Brick program has seen 40,000+ etched bricks placed along the 2.5 mile Riverwalk Park, and the Riverwalk Banners program highlights corporate and individual support of Riverwalk to the District‚Äôs 1.5 million annual visitors.

Since 2003 Riverwalk has produced the official Fort Lauderdale city magazine, Go Riverwalk Magazine, with twelve annual issues aimed at business and community leaders, residents and visitors alike.  Riverwalk has seven social media accounts, weekly e-blasts to Riverwalk and community members, and an active website that hosts the Greater Fort Lauderdale Events Calendar, which highlights events both in downtown Fort Lauderdale and throughout Broward County.

Riverwalk is the primary advocate for the improvement and activation of the Riverwalk Park and the ten additional City of Fort Lauderdale Parks in the Riverwalk District.  Riverwalk has been responsible for the many art installations and public exercise stations along the Riverwalk, as well as advocating to establish the free Riverwalk Water Trolley.  Most recently, Riverwalk completed the 9/11 Memorial, displaying a segment of the PATH rail tracks taken from the wreckage of the World Trade Center.

ThinkingAhead Executive Search is an Equal Opportunity Employer, committed to a work environment that supports, inspires and respects all individuals by acknowledging that an individual‚Äôs identity adds to the value each employee brings to the organization.  Our personnel processes are merit-based and applied without discrimination on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age, disability, national or ethnic ancestry, military service status, citizenship, or other protected characteristics. personSummary:
Passionate and tireless recruiter and leader.  I approach talent acquisition with an open mind, valuing both candidates and clients through a wide lens perspective. My commitment lies in not just filling positions but in strategically aligning business needs with individuals who seamlessly integrate into the company's culture, and constant hands-on development of my team.

On the recruiting side, I pride myself on establishing genuine connections with candidates, delving beyond resumes to understand their aspirations and motivations. This depth allows me to not only position them optimally for their next opportunity but also allows me to act as a trusted career counselor, guiding them towards long-term success whether it be through me, or another opportunity.

On the client side, I leverage my training and business instincts to uncover the root of their challenges. Instead of a quick-fix approach, I focus on addressing the true business needs before presenting suitable candidates. It's a strategic mindset that goes beyond merely "chucking candidates" and ensures a thoughtful and effective solution to their staffing needs.

On a more personal business note, my work ethic is the cornerstone of my identity.  This is something that was instilled in me from a young age.  A decorated all-state athlete in high school, I overcame a severe shoulder injury to walk on to the University at Buffalo Division 1 FBS Football Team.  I quickly worked my way into a starting spot at Fullback, and earned a full athletic scholarship.  I went on to become a 3-year starter and scholar athlete academically.  I now carry that same approach into my professional life.  This lunch pail, hard hat mentality of consistently doing the right things every day has shaped the man I have become.

In my personal life, I am an avid weightlifter and a well-accomplished powerlifter.  I set national records in the 275-pound weight class.  My best lifts include a roughly 600 lb bench press, 800 lb deadlift, and 800+ lb squat, all without any wraps or equipment. I also run and play in a men's league ice hockey team, the "Lindy Buffs," paying homage to Sabres Coach Lindy Ruff.  Off the ice, I am a sauna enthusiast.  I've built my own and love talking about anything and everything sauna/cold tub treatment, investments of all kinds and of course UB FOOTBALL!  Lover of XL dogs, including my Cane Corso, Roman.  For those who wonder about the nickname, "Boomer," it's been with me since birth, a testament to my size and presence.

Happy to connect with people from all walks of life!

personTitleDescription: JW Michaels & Co. is an executive search firm dedicated to serving the specialized recruiting needs of top-tier financial services, legal, technology, and business institutions.
personSummary:
I'm one of the co-founders of JW Michaels & Co., a premier executive search firm.  I specialize in alternative asset management, having led COO, CRO, GC, CCO, and other similar searches for prominent hedge funds, private equity firms, endowments, foundations and family offices. 

I‚Äôm also an early-stage investor who‚Äôs focused on the consumer space, notably health, wellness & food. I‚Äôm passionate about brands that positively impact people's lives and are socially responsible.
companyDescription:
JW Michaels & Co. is a premier executive search firm founded in 2010. Since our founding, we have grown exponentially from a small team to a firm with a national presence. We continue to grow because we stay true to our mission, using the best people to find the best people. 

It takes a specialist to know what you do, and to appreciate what you need, that is why as we have grown into additional areas of practice, we have added over 100 experts in fields ranging from hedge funds to health care. 

We work with companies of all sizes and levels from a multitude of Fortune 100 companies to small start-ups with unique growth opportunities. Additionally we partner with investment management firms, banks, broker-dealers, hedge funds, and a host of other institutions across fields and industries. It is because of our relationships with these firms that we are able to offer unique opportunities that you will not find elsewhere. More importantly though, it is because we understand both their needs as well as yours that we not just maintain this extensive network, but grow it naturally through our referrals.

Our team is your team, whether you are looking for a vertical move or a lateral one, we work to ensure that you find your best fit to ensure not just a new job, but a new career. And when, as often is the case, you find yourself looking for new pastures, JW Michaels will guarantee your placement exactly where you want to be. 

Want to find out how we can help you? Email us at jmcelroy@jwmichaels.com or call at 646-624-2305.

personTitleDescription:
At ProActivate, we specialize in providing top leadership, sales, and marketing talent for our partners, and truly understand the sales mindset, which is one of the hardest areas of recruiting. We seek out successful and motivated candidates to find the right fit for our clients. 

ProActivate‚Äôs dynamic approach to sales talent acquisition is different from traditional recruiting companies, who typically get paid a percentage of each placement. companyDescription:
ProActivate is second to none in the market for talent acquisition and executive recruiting.

We offer a best-in-class talent acquisition model that uses precise in-depth methodology and behavior modeling to qualify talent. With rigorous simulation and evaluation of mindset and skillset, we‚Äôre able to offer only the most qualified working and winning professionals.

Our fees are fixed, not based on compensation. Because ProActivate‚Äôs talent managers are not paid based on placement, they are not coaching candidates on what to say to get hired. Their focus stays fixed firmly on ensuring your company gains only top talent.

personTitleDescription:

Satellite offices in Denver, Colorado and Boston, Massachusetts [the ‚ÄòNew Energy Capital of the US‚Äô] are due to open in early 2022, to provide regional support to the developing US renewable sector.

personTitleDescription: Founded in 1987, The Onstott Group is a leading retained executive search firm located in the greater Boston area. personSummary:
Pat Campbell co-founded The Onstott Group in 1987.  With a background in management consulting, Pat brings a thoughtful and consultative approach to building high performance management teams.  She has successfully completed executive search assignments for clients in software, consumer products, non-profit, higher education, services, and private equity industries. Her clients range from early-stage ventures to large public companies. 

Pat has been named to the Top 10 Recruiters by Women‚Äôs Business Boston. Her clients describe Pat as ‚Äúdynamic and passionate‚Äù, ‚Äúhighly professional‚Äù and ‚Äúdetermined to win and succeed‚Äù. They emphasize Pat‚Äôs ‚Äúamazing ability to weave herself within the company culture . . . upholding her business ethics while executing decisively and above and beyond expectations‚Äù.
 
Pat is a member of the Leadership Board at Northwestern University, and previously served on the Advisory Board for the F.W. Olin Graduate School of Business at Babson College.  A long-standing member of the Association of Executive Search Consultants, Pat currently sits on the AESC Americas Council, where she chairs the membership committee.  She holds an M.B.A. from Babson College and a B.A. with academic distinction from Northwestern University.

personTitleDescription:
DAVRON is the specialized executive search and outplacement firm that connects companies with top tier professionals worldwide. Our recruiters match clients' needs with high quality executives and technical experts across Engineering, Architectural, Construction and Manufacturing disciplines.

personSummary:

personSummary:
William Crawford Stonehouse III is the Co-Founder and President of Crawford Thomas Recruiting, a high-end staffing agency that specializes in sales recruitment, accounting, information technology, engineering, human resources, management, and life sciences. With over 15 years of experience in the staffing industry, he has built a reputation for delivering quality candidates to a diverse range of clients, from venture-backed startups and Inc. 500 companies to Fortune 1000 corporations.

personTitleDescription:
M√©tier: n. a calling; the work for which a person excels; one‚Äôs specialty, area of expertise, or strength; a forte; your purpose. 

Truex M√©tier is the reincarnation of Truex Associates, one of the most successful and well known staffing companies in the Bay Area during the 80s and 90s. Founded in 1983 by Mary Ann Truex and John Cullens, Truex Associates grew to 500 contract and permanent employees throughout California. Truex Associates along with its sister company, Truex Temps, were sold to a publically traded staffing company in 1998. 

After the sale, John and Mary Ann became involved in various venture capital and nonprofit endeavors including 6 years of research into Positive Psychology and its effect on corporate productivity. This was the most exciting of all of their ventures. Can positivity actually have an impact on the productivity and profitability of an organization? 

There are several successful companies that are helping their clients improve positivity in their existing employees, but why not recruit and hire positive employees instead of ‚Äúfixing‚Äù them later? Few companies have the recruiting experience and the expertise in Positive Psychology required to source and evaluate positive candidates. And we all know that positive, highly productive candidates don‚Äôt fall into our laps or spend their lives searching job postings; they must be sought after. 

Truex M√©tier is the integration of two decades of staffing experience and the power of Positive Psychology working together to assist our clients in the science of hiring positive, productive employees. As important, is our ability to test and teach existing employees the power of positivity in their work and personal lives. That is our true m√©tier.

What is your true m√©tier?

companyDescription:
The Human Immunome Project (HIP) is a global NGO dedicated to decoding and modeling the immune system. 

The human immune system is one of the most complex systems in the world‚Äîand one of its most important. It determines whether we survive infancy, which diseases we get, how we age, and how long we‚Äôll live. Within it lie the secrets of who will respond, and how, to potential threats to our health. Understanding it is the key to fighting disease and improving health for all. Yet its complexity has limited our ability to tap into its potential‚Äîuntil now.

Recent advances in AI provide the tools to rapidly process the trillions of datapoints required to model the immune system, understand how it varies across individuals, and develop targeted approaches to elongating healthspans and combatting disease.

The Human Immunome Project (HIP) was designed to meet this moment‚Äîto combine systems biology with the power of artificial intelligence, to decode and model the immune system to improve health for all.

Vision: We envision a future that harnesses the power of the immune system to improve health for all. 

Mission: We generate diverse immunological datasets at scale and build publicly available AI models of the immune system to accelerate medical research and drug discovery, improve health, and decrease healthcare costs worldwide.

companyDescription:
ZeroMark empowers US and allied forces with cutting-edge defense technology, elevating mission success and safeguarding personnel.

Our forte lies in a unique counter-drone solution, manifested through an AI-enabled auto-aiming system. By adapting commercial firearms with our convergence of computer vision and precision robotics, we transform handheld weapons into potent tools for automatically detecting, tracking, and neutralizing drones effortlessly.

We recognize that prevailing C-UAS strategies often leave dismounted personnel inadequately prepared to confront the swiftly advancing drone menaces. Our solution ensures that military and law enforcement entities are empowered with proficient drone deterrence and denial capabilities, integrated into the weaponry they already possess and will continue to carry. This approach sidesteps the impractical reliance on multi-million dollar assets to counter a $200 drone threat, presenting a pragmatic and cost-effective defense solution.

companyName: Grande Center for Education and Economic Opportunity
companyDescription:
We are a non-profit organization creating bilingual, and technology focused schools and adult education centers to promote short and long-term economic opportunity for people in rural El Salvador.  School by day and adult workforce training by night, we are positioned to leverage change in the local community in El Salvador providing a needed framework of remote work.  

Our flagship project is in Chalatenango, a rural department in El Salvador with over 300,000 inhabitants.  Its economy has been centered historically in agriculture and additionally was hit hard during the nation‚Äôs civil war from 1980 until 1992.  Economic forces made agriculture no longer a sustainable economy which has led to forced migration to the USA with families looking for economic opportunity.  The economy is now highly dependent on remittances from Salvadoran immigrants. There have been other impacts of emigration like separated families, mental health, a further fractured education system, and loss of most talented young people for long term economic development.

The goals of the Adult Education Center will be to train cohorts of adults in short intervals for entry level tech jobs like data entry, data labeling, talent sourcing, Google Suite, and Spanish customer service reps.  The program will promote basic English fluency and specific technical skills to complete important tasks for international companies.  Upon completing certificates, our organization will help place adult residents into entry level placements to work remotely from El Salvador, helping to create a new industry in the area.  Graduates will pay back a portion of their salary to cover current students in the program to create a self-sustaining model after initial startup.

We are launching our school in January serving Kindergarten and 1st grade partnering with the Catholic Bishop in the area.  We will be adding a middle school and high school in subsequent years to fill out a full K-12 school in 5 years.

personTitleDescription:
First developed in 1993 and continually enhanced since, HRMC Acclaim is a talent acquisition software-as-a-service, flexible platform that automates all the activity from a candidates' first expression of interest through all the steps in the selection process into a single-session, nonstop candidate engagement offering an immediate interview with job-specific questions rather than reliance on a resume submittal, culminating in immediate candidate feedback on status.  Artificial intelligence is used to control the flow of questioning, evaluation of the responses, and rank-ordering all applicants from most- to least-suited for the position.  These highly interactive processes can include video introductions, technical and behavioral interviews, assessments, simulations, voice auditions, virtual tours and many other capabilities.  Consistent selection accuracy is enhanced,  time-to-fill is accelerated, while improving the candidate experience and enhancing the employer brand.  Interviews can be conducted most anywhere in the world, in any international language via the internet, phone, or a combination of both.  Works on any device.

Top candidates will be most attracted to those organizations that are considerate of their time, provide an efficient and effective evaluation process, and give them closure in a timely manner.  The race for talent will be won by those organizations that can whisk a candidate through a world-class experience without the prerequisite of a resume or complicated forms completion as a first step.  HRMC Acclaim helps companies achieve those objectives.
personSummary:
Everyone deserves an interview!  My life has been about replicating the perfect one for each position and making them ‚Äúon-demand‚Äù.  

Technology that replicates your best hiring manager and functions as if they had time for everyone.   As many as 3 million interviews (1,200 in 15 minutes) annually creates a lot of good will.   Better candidate pool and the industry‚Äôs best short list while maintaining the lowest cost of any system. 

45 year career providing bottom line value to corporations, first as an HR practitioner and then as an HR entrepreneur using artificial intelligence engines to automate Human Resource functions, including the decisioning that normally interrupts conventional processing flows.  In depth, accelerated intensive experience as a practitioner included negotiating 13 union contracts with Teamsters, Machinists, and other unions; opening and closing operations, serving as chairman of industry-wide compensation committee; establishing international hiring programs; personally hiring thousands of employees in leadership, professional, technical, and production capacities.

Based on these experiences, started HRMC as a full service, independent ‚ÄúHR Department‚Äù, handling the HR aspects of over 60 corporate relocations and expansions.  As a value-driven organization, we later morphed into a technology company leveraging computerization, IVR, web, video, and AI technologies to provide greater efficiency and effectiveness.  HRMC‚Äôs flagship service, HRMC Acclaim, automates the entire selection process from candidates‚Äô first expression of interest all the way through scheduling the most promising applicants for the final, on-site interview in a highly interactive, single nonstop experience.
companyName: HRMC - Human Resource Management Center, Inc.
companyDescription:
HRMC ingenuity creation of Acclaim recruitment CRM as a fully automated assessment platform that standardizes best hiring practices, sources better candidates, delivers your company‚Äôs unique employment branding message, while giving candidates real job specific questions for the jobs they are applying for. Acclaim rank orders your candidates based on skills AND culture fit, functioning as a stand alone system or as a Plug-in integrating with your other vendors, while working hard for both your applicants and Hiring Managers success.

HRMC.com has been working to give you back the freedom to 1) Add or change what Assessment Test or Assessment Vendor is connected to each job, 2) Ask important questions to your applicants up front, 3) Give every applicant an Automated 1st Interview without needing a resume.  

People are complex. Few are reducible to a resume or a set of responses to standard interview questions.  ATS systems are only as good as the (less than 100% reliable) data candidates enter.  Based on years of development and input from some of the best minds in I/O psychology, HR, and Recruiting, Acclaim blends the knowledge you‚Äôve gained about successful new hires and how to identify them...and applies that intelligence dynamically to all candidates entering the system. Over 40 million candidates have been engaged by Acclaim -- where no two engagements are exactly alike!  

How much time have you wasted over the years reading resumes that don‚Äôt tell you what you need to know, asking the same preliminary interview questions over and over only to hear the same thoroughly rehearsed polished replies, and realizing a prospect is not a viable candidate five minutes into a face-to-face interview? Acclaim handles the initial phases of your selection process...and frees your time to use your expertise and judgment where it's most valued: at the final interview stage where you make the fine distinctions that separate the "Great"‚Äã hire from the "Good"‚Äã hire.

DIFFERENT. BETTER. WE DELIVER.

At Frederick Fox, we are focused on two main deliverables:

1. We Deliver for our clients. We do this by providing highly personalized service while leveraging the advancements in big data, automation and intelligence.

2. We are committed to energizing our recruiters with a more rewarding business model. We built a disruptive community model, which properly incentivizes our recruiters, responsibly manages our pooled back office, and builds an executive search brand with a strong market position.

We use a Contingency Fee Model because it is better for our clients and better for us. Our clients are not locked into long-term, exclusive retainer agreements with higher fees hoping for results. For our recruiters, working on contingency spurs the delivery of results that are responsive, accurate, and

About Me:

My passions lie both with business and making this world a better place. I thrive on starting and building businesses or improving existing companies that need help.

For example, when the European Sales Director at Visual Numerics left suddenly, I was asked to go over there, "hold down the fort" and hire a replacement - a three month project. I ended up staying on board for 5 years! It was a tough time during the first year - the company was well established, but not doing great. At my strong urging, we completed a challenging restructuring of my division (that became part of an overall company overhaul) and the next year my division returned to profitability. My team members became more enthusiastic, motivated, and successful at their respective jobs, and they're still in contact with me to this day.

I thrive on creating, developing and deepening relationships - with clients, partners, vendors, anyone and everyone to help us all succeed in business. companyDescription:
WE ARE CHANGING THE WAY PEOPLE BUY AND SELL HOMES

Over the last 20 years, the Internet has changed the way we live, from booking travel to watching movies, and from paying taxes to banking. Online transactions are faster, cheaper to execute, more convenient, and generally more secure. Residential real estate, by contrast, remains stuck in a high-cost business model that pre-dates the Internet and remains stubbornly resistant to change. Harnessed properly, technology can help a lot ‚Äì already, nearly 90% of consumers looking for a home go to sites like Zillow or Google to find and eventually select the properties that best suit their needs.

We created REX in 2015 to bring residential real estate into line with today‚Äôs expectations by using AI and big data to push past the outmoded practices of traditional real estate brokers to provide a superior outcome for both buyers and sellers at one-third the cost. So how does REX do it? We use data modeling and machine learning to match sellers and buyers of homes as accurately and speedily as possible on Zillow, Google, Facebook, and more. And by doing that, we can reduce costs for all involved - REX covers both sides of the transaction instead of the 5-6% charged by traditional brokers.

Unlike traditional brokers, REX licensed agents are salaried and incentivized to satisfy customers rather than to just close transactions in pursuit of a fast commission. Our team partners with sellers and buyers from listing to close, and shares with them the information they need via an easy-to-use web dashboard. REX is uniquely designed to simplify all of the moving parts, helping consumers with escrow, titling, service connections, mortgage and insurance shopping and keeps securely in the hands of the buyers and sellers all of the data related to the home and legal and financial information related to the transactions.

personSummary:

When I first started in recruiting, it was a different world. Cold calls from the Yellow Pages were the norm. Then came fax machines, email, and now, everything revolves around LinkedIn and job boards.
But while technology has changed, one thing hasn‚Äôt: businesses need the right people, and people need the right opportunities.

üîπ Adapting, Growing, and Thriving üîπ

Over the years, I‚Äôve evolved from administrative recruiting to healthcare (orthopedics) and, for the last 18 years, I‚Äôve specialized in accounting & finance at Staff Financial Group. I work closely with CEOs and presidents‚Äîleaders who know exactly what they need. They trust me to deliver, and I thrive on the challenge. Finding top-tier talent quickly is what I do best.

üîπ Relationships Built on Trust üîπ

Many of the professionals I‚Äôve placed have become clients. Many clients have become friends. When they call, we talk business‚Äîbut we also talk about life, especially our dogs (I have three golden retrievers üê∂). It‚Äôs these connections that make my job so fulfilling.

üîπ Why I Love What I Do üîπ

There‚Äôs nothing better than a candidate calling to say, ‚ÄúThank you for helping me land my dream job.‚Äù Sometimes it‚Äôs about a higher salary, sometimes a shorter commute, and sometimes it‚Äôs just about finding the right culture fit. On the client side, I love knowing that the right hire allows them to focus on growth instead of constantly searching for talent.
They say, ‚ÄúDo what you love, and you‚Äôll never work a day in your life.‚Äù After three decades, I still feel like I haven‚Äôt worked a day.

In addition to staffing, the firm provides testing and assessment services, background checks, PEO/Payroll services, out placement services and consulting.

In July of 2009, The Waters Organization was acquired by Holly Monaghan and Melanie Davis, making the firm a new female-owned business. The two women have a combined 15 years of experience with the firm and 20 years in staffing.

Despite current economic times, the team continues to post exceptional results and the firm has experienced a 300% sales growth under their leadership over the past 2 years.

personTitleDescription: We are a contract staffing agency for the Oil/Gas, Petrochem/Refinery industries both onshore & offshore.

personSummary:
RTI Associates focuses on direct hire placements for higher-level professionals in Accounting, Engineering, Sales, Manufacturing, Technical, and Executive Office fields.  Our goal is to build long-term relationships with our clients.  We will go great lengths to ensure our valuable clients receive first-rate service.   RTI Associates prides itself on efficiency, extensive hiring methods, and concentrated one on one attention and communication so that we successfully meet our companies time-sensitive staffing needs. 
RTI Associates is ready to work in partnership with you!
companyDescription:
Reliable Temps Inc. is a full service staffing agency providing general labor, warehouse, manufacturing, clerical, accounting, management and technical staffing for direct hire, temp to hire and temporary placement to local businesses.

Licensed in Massachusetts, Connecticut and New Hampshire, we are conveniently located in Agawam, Orange and Greenfield, MA and are able to provide high quality services along the 91 corridor, from northern CT to Franklin County and southern NH.

personSummary: Lana is President and Owner of Lanmark Staffing Company, Lanmark Pro and Allegiance Professional Group and has over 35 years of Human Resource/Staffing Industry experience. Lanmark Staffing specializes in temporary and Direct Placement of employees in a wide variety of fields including Warehousing Logistics, Plastics and Rubber Manufacturing, Hospitality, Accounting and Administration.  Lanmark Staffing services all of Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana with temporary and temporary to hire employees. Allegiance Professional Group provides Direct Placement and Payroll services for all fields.

personTitleDescription:
Buffkin / Baker is a retained, national executive search and consulting firm.  The members of the firm have extensive backgrounds in retained executive search, collectively bringing over 175 years of experience.  Buffkin / Baker has offices in Atlanta, Charlotte, Nashville, New York, Winston-Salem, and Washington, D.C.  The firm has 14 partners nationwide.  The professional staff of the firm has conducted over 1,500 searches for a diverse corporate and non-profit clientele.  The firm conducts searches to recruit leaders in the Higher Education, Digital Marketing/Advertising, Technology, Health Care, Media/Entertainment, and Nonprofit sectors.   
 
Buffkin / Baker‚Äôs higher education practice is one of the most prominent in the country, having conducted over 650 searches for universities, colleges, and health science centers.  The professionals of the firm have recently conducted searches for a number of institutions within Power Five conferences, as well as leading liberal arts colleges, AAU institutions, HBCUs, and regional universities.
companyDescription: Buffkin / Baker is a partner-led executive search firm specializing in Healthcare, Higher Education, Private Equity, Technology/Digital, Consumer, and Non-Profit sectors. Each partner, a leader in their field, brings over a decade of retained search experience, contributing to a collective total of more than 300 years in search and over 400 years in industry and operational expertise. The firm operates from multiple locations, including Atlanta, Austin, Boston, Charlotte, Chattanooga, Cleveland, Kansas City, Los Angeles, Nashville, New York, San Francisco, Seattle, St. Simons Island, Tampa, Washington, DC, and Winston-Salem. Buffkin / Baker is a member of Panorama, a global community of over 400 leadership experts working together in 70+ office locations to promote a diverse perspective on leadership, embracing creative thinking, and sharing our expertise and experience to bring our clients the very best results.

personLocation: New York, New York, United States

personTitleDescription:
As founder and CEO of JCSI, I value the relationships we have with our clients, the candidates we bring to them, and the dedicated employees who make up our team. 

An early pioneer in re-defining what RPO service can mean, at JCSI, we forge strong partnerships with our clients based on flexibility, transparency, and accountability. We also pride ourselves on our expertise at finding A-level candidates who may not be actively seeking employment and engaging them to learn about career opportunities with our clients.

By using state-of-the-art networking tools, leveraging our relationships in the marketplace, and supplementing our efforts with conventional methods, we find candidates who fit client profiles both technically and culturally.  Our commitment to providing exceptional recruitment consulting services is unwavering and backed by the JCSI delivery guarantee.
 
Since opening our doors in 1999, we have helped companies throughout the U.S. add to their talent pool in a significant way. Building on this success and growing JCSI as the company clients, candidates, and our employees continue to choose is my life work.
personSummary:
In 1999, I founded JCSI to capitalize on my experiences working in all aspects of the recruiting industry, channeling the best of what I‚Äôd learned into the firm, and strengthening it with a solid understanding of corporate staffing priorities. With JCSI, I created a hybrid between contract recruiting and agency services to offer clients a flexible and effective RPO model without expensive contingency fees. 

Because we consult with clients as an extension of their HR teams, our close partnerships increase search efficiency, resulting in better candidates and reducing cost per hire. We work on an hourly, adjustable basis, so clients have the flexibility to use our recruiting expertise as a supplement to their staffing departments as needs occur within their organizations.

From full-cycle recruiting to pipeline development, flexibility and service have become the hallmark of the firm, enabling JCSI to be successful for more than a dozen years through some challenging economic times. Our model continues to thrive today, and although we are constantly refining our tools, the basic tenets of customer service, value, and candidate research and engagement remain.

As we constantly improve on our process and delivery to clients, I continue to be committed to advancing cutting-edge practices and offering the best recruitment services available.

Specialties: 
- Recruitment Consulting
- Candidate Sourcing
- Passive Candidate Marketing and Engagement
- Talent Acquisition
- Executive Search
- Recruitment Process Outsourcing
- Pipeline Development
- College Recruiting
- Interview Days
- Staffing Consultant
- Full-Cycle Recruiting
companyDescription:
Since its founding in 1999, JCSI has evolved into an innovative RPO firm with expertise in finding and engaging the best candidates.Hiring the right people is essential for any business to succeed, and JCSI offers expertise in staffing strategies along with flexibility and guaranteed delivery‚Äîwithout contingency fees!

Unlike traditional recruiting firms, JCSI targets passive candidates on every search. Whether hourly, salaried or executive level, our customized recruiting model results in better hires, faster, at a lower cost. When you take advantage of our RPO-quantity hiring, you gain additional savings and flexibility along with excellent hires.

JCSI‚Äôs unique approach enables a seamless extension to client HR teams while building relationships with top candidates in their industries. Offering flexibility, a team approach, and a proven, project-based process, JCSI provides better candidates, faster, and at lower cost.

No matter the role level or industry, our unique process delivers top candidates to your team. JCSI's recruiting experience spans a wide variety of industries, and our expertise is strongest with the below

Since Bruce Raines founded Raines International Inc. (RII) in 1969, the firm has built an executive search platform with a global footprint and diversified client base. Today, RII covers all major industries and business functions, and its global reach includes successful efforts on six continents.
As Senior Managing Director, Mr. Raines serves as the company‚Äôs Practice Leader for all senior level general management searches. He also conceived of and leads the firm‚Äôs Strategy & Corporate Development Practice, recruiting ‚Äúnext generation‚Äù senior executives from management consulting firms and their alumni.
In addition to his practice leadership roles, Mr. Raines‚Äô personal assignments have included all areas of finance, marketing, sales, procurement and the supply chain. He has successfully recruited Chief Executive Officers and Chief Operating Officers, as well as other ‚ÄúC-Suite‚Äù executives and their direct reports throughout the world.
Mr. Raines has been a leading advocate for the executive search industry. In the mid-2000s he co-authored the first set of industry standards published by the Association of Executive Search and Leadership Consultants (AESC). He also conceived the industry‚Äôs first foray into academia, advising Cornell University and the AESC on the development of a curriculum and certificate program on ‚Äúbest practices‚Äù in executive search.
In April of 2018, Mr. Raines was honored for his contributions to the executive search industry, as the recipient of the AESC‚Äôs Lifetime Achievement Award. He has served as a trusted, strategic adviser to clients, provided valuable counsel to hundreds of executives on their paths to the C-Suite, and has written and lectured on a variety of management and executive search topics. On a more personal note, Mr. Raines is a strong advocate for charitable causes, a leader in developing RII‚Äôs social conscience, and an avid supporter of America Needs You, a not-for-profit supporting ‚Äúfirst in the family‚Äù college students.

companyDescription:
CES is a full cycle recruitment agency with a combined staffing experience of over 30 years. The experience of CES enables us to offer a more refined and innovative approach for recruitment solutions, for both contract and permanent positions within the Engineering, I.T, Finance, Management, Automation, Skilled Trades, Administration, Health Care, and Light Industrial industries.

The CES Approach


CES devotes an extensive budget towards advertising which is a required step to ensure that clients connect with the best possible candidates available on the market.

The success of CES comes from the communication they establish with their clients. With a clear understanding of the hiring requirements, organizational structure, values and long term goals, CES sources, attracts and engages high quality talent. CES has over 1 million applicants within their recruitment database, enabling them to fill all needs promptly and efficiently, far surpassing industry competition. CES is a one stop shop for all recruitment ads, and guarantee all clients a 60 second response time after initial contact with CES.

CES History

Established in 2011 by Kyle Pinsonneault, CES has grown from a start-up in house agency, to an accomplished multi-million dollar international recruitment agency, with offices across Canada and the USA. CES has a proven track record in recruiting not just for small businesses but Fortune 500 corporations as well, all the while providing 100% customer satisfaction. Talent acquisition is becoming increasingly competitive within all industries, and finding that right ‚Äúpiece to the puzzle‚Äù involves more than determining one‚Äôs accomplishments on paper. companyDescription:
We at The Digital Headhunter understand that the recruitment industry is hyper-competitive, with the big-name brands gaining immense market share, yet in an industry with zero barriers to entry, it seems all the junior recruiters trained by the big brands are now starting their own independent firms, and further commoditizing your service and crowding you out of your market.

Unfortunately, you'll find a lot of trainers and digital marketing experts who have never placed a candidate, trying to sell you a quick and easy fix with ‚Äòclick-bait‚Äô headlines like ‚ÄúNever cold-call again!‚Äù or ‚ÄúGet leads on auto-pilot!‚Äù

At The Digital Headhunter we specialize in helping independent Executive Recruiters and Search Firm Owners like you compete and win against the big-name brand every time, but we do so without the false promises and empty platitudes.

Founded by a David Stephen Patterson, a Headhunter with 20 years of real-world experience in Executive Search, we offer a variety of Do-it-Yourself, Done-with-You, and Done-for-You programs designed to help you deploy The Lighthouse Method‚Ñ¢ in your practice.

The Lighthouse Method‚Ñ¢ is our proprietary method for:

üöÄ Launching a bonafide higher-level offer
üöÄ Becoming the recruiter of choice in your industry
üöÄ AND legitimately scaling your practice to surpass 7 or even 8-figures

Our clients achieve these results at through a proven process of old-school recruitment and sales training, and new-school digital marketing techniques, such as content marketing, LinkedIn and email marketing, social media advertising, etc. We also help you establish a system to then deliver on your Higher-Level Offer, and from there how to scale it so you are no longer stuck in perpetual hustle mode.

Bottom-line, we leave no stone unturned, and we're not here to tell you that you'll never have to make another phone call again.

Message us to learn more about our programs.

personTitleDescription:
At MDC Ventures, we specialize in driving business transformation through strategic growth, visionary leadership, and seamless exits. Our commitment is to cultivate a culture of continuous improvement, genuine collaboration, and enduring success, empowering your business to excel in today‚Äôs dynamic market

Philosophy......

Sales: Focus on the future, create urgency, qualify prospects, deliver solutions, and commit to professional excellence.

Leadership: Cultivate belief in shared vision, prioritize learning and development, master details, champion change, emphasize accountability, and maintain honesty.

personSummary:
I have 25 years recruitment experience across UK, Australia and US. In that time I had success moving from $1m biller to Leader to Entrepreneur. 

By 2008, I co-founded ConSol Partners, an award winning tech staffing business built on a clear philosophy:
* Control and Accountability: Success is driven by individuals, not luck or circumstance.
* Specialization: Focus on high-value, future-proof industries rather than low-value, high-volume models.
* Learning and Development: Invest heavily in training and progression for every team member.
* Innovation: Focus on what‚Äôs coming next and stay ahead of the curve.

We stayed true to these principles, growing the business to $50 million in annual sales with offices in four global locations and placements in over 60 countries. We grew the business rapidly and in 2013 I moved back to Los Angeles to establish and grow our US presence. By 2019, after 12 years of growth and hard work, we achieved a full exit by selling to a public company at 8.6x multiple. 

That‚Äôs when I embraced my next chapter.
Today, I‚Äôm based in Los Angeles, where I focus on investing in tech, private equity, and real estate.  Through MDC Ventures, I help businesses and leaders master the art of growth, innovation, and leadership with a specialism of helping UK companies establish and scale stateside. 
My approach is built on hard-earned lessons and straight-talking honesty.

Here‚Äôs what I‚Äôve learned along the way:
* Be Yourself: People buy into people, not fa√ßades. Show your personality, admit mistakes, and let others see who you really are.
* Take Risks: You can‚Äôt achieve something extraordinary without stepping outside your comfort zone.
* Know Yourself: Your career should reflect your values, not someone else‚Äôs expectations.
* Build a Philosophy: Success comes from having a clear approach to how you work and lead.
* Focus on the Future: Always look five years ahead. Where will the opportunities be?
