personTitleDescription:
Established in 2000, LanceSoft is a pioneer in delivering top-notch Global Workforce Solutions and IT Services to a diverse clientele. As a Certified MBE and Woman-Owned organization, we pride ourselves on fostering global cross-cultural connections that advance both the careers of our employees and the success of our clients' businesses.

At LanceSoft, our mission is clear: to leverage our global network to seamlessly connect businesses with the right talent and individuals with the right opportunities, all without bias. We believe in providing Global Workforce Solutions with a personalized, human touch.

Our comprehensive range of services spans various domains, encompassing temporary and permanent staffing, Statement of Work (SOW) arrangements, payrolling, Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO), application design and development, program/project management, and engineering solutions.

Currently, our team of over 5,000 professionals caters to 110+ enterprise clients worldwide, including Fortune companies. Our client base represents a diverse spectrum of industries, including Banking & Financial Services, Semiconductor/VLSI, Technology, Healthcare & Life Sciences, Government, Telecom & Media, Retail & Distribution, Oil & Gas, and Energy & Utilities.

Headquartered in Herndon, VA, LanceSoft operates 32+ regional offices across the North America, Europe, Asia, and Australia. We also have nine delivery centers strategically located in India in Bangalore, Indore, Noida, Baroda, Hyderabad, Bhubaneshwar, Dehradun, Goa, and Aligarh to further enhance our client service capabilities.

personTitleDescription:
Creative Artists Agency (CAA) acquired Hanold Associates to expand the CAA Executive Search global footprint. We are a Top 20 Retained global Executive Search firm, focused on HR, Board and Corporate Officers recruitment. We identify, assess and recruit distinctive Chief HR Officers, Corporate Officers, CFOs, and Board Directors and their teams down through Director levels. 

CAA is the largest global entertainment and sports agency, with expertise in filmed and live entertainment, digital media, publishing, sponsorship sales and endorsements, media finance, consumer investing, fashion, brand management and consumer product licensing, executive search and philanthropy. 

We serve world-class organizations across geographies and industries including clients such as Disney, The NFL, USA Gymnastics, Zoom, American Airlines, Under Armour, a16z, Fanatics, Moderna, Nordstrom, Shondaland, Paramount, Federal Reserve Bank, Gucci, Tom Brady TB12, Zoom, Prada, Nordstrom, Augusta National, Formula 1, LPGA, Major League Baseball, Patagonia, Gucci, The New York Times, Apollo, Silver Lake, TPG, Abercrombie & Fitch, Big Ten Conference, Ford Motor Company, NIKE, REI, MGM Resorts International, Cartier, Live Nation Entertainment, Google, eBay, Fiat-Chrysler, Northwestern University, L Catterton, Blackstone, Mylan, CDW, Amazon, Fossil, Carnival Corporation, Carnegie Mellon University, PG&E, Vail Resorts, AbbVie, Oaktree Capital, Whirlpool, ServiceMaster, Xerox, Las Vegas Convention & Visitors Authority, KKR, Bridgestone, Cargill, Warburg-Pincus, Las Vegas Sands, Heinz, Riddell, RedBird Capital, Tesla, Team USA, F1, Kering, Tyson, Whirlpool, Robert F. Kennedy Human Rights, Simon & Schuster, Shondaland, Phillips 66 and the UFC among others.
personSummary:
Jason Hanold is the President of CAA Executive Search,   within Creative Artists Agency. CAA acquired Hanold Associates Executive Search & Leadership Advisory in 2024, where he was founder and CEO. Jason established special relationships with client CEOs, Founders and Commissioners as he led the firm's mission to identify, assess and recruit distinctive Chief HR Officers, Corporate Officers, Chief People Officers, Chief Financial Officers, General Counsels, COOs, Chief Executive Officers and Board Directors for world-class organizations across geographies and industries, with a spike in Family Offices. 

Jason is a trusted source for talent, culture, leadership and executive perspectives for media outlets such as The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, ABC News, CNN/Money, The Hollywood Reporter, Variety, Deadline and Forbes. Jason is on the Board of Directors and an inductee selector for the National Football Foundation & College Football Hall of Fame. 

Clients include: a16z, The National Football League (NFL), Team USA, USA Gymnastics, Augusta National, LPGA, Fanatics, Ford Motor, Nordstrom, The New York Times, Tom Brady & TB12, Phillips 66, Silver Lake, Major League Baseball, Zoom, Gucci, Kering, Prada, Cartier, Tiffany & Co., New York Giants Football, Arizona Cardinals, Chicago Cubs, Apollo, Shore Capital, TPG, REI, L Catterton, Acushnet, Moderna, GEICO, Indeed.com, McKinsey, Tapestry, Tory Burch, Northwestern, Riddell, Dick‚Äôs Sporting Goods, Coach, American Airlines, Nike, Tesla and Under Armour and many Family Offices among many others. 

Jason is married to Neela Seenandan, has four sons, and lives between Jackson, Wyoming and Winnetka, Illinois. He is often in the CAA offices in LA and NYC when not in Chicago.
companyDescription: Creative Artists Agency (CAA) is the leading entertainment and sports agency, with global expertise in filmed and live entertainment, digital media, publishing, sponsorship sales and endorsements, media finance, consumer investing, fashion, trademark licensing, and philanthropy.  Distinguished by its culture of collaboration and exceptional client service, CAA‚Äôs diverse workforce identifies, innovates, and amplifies opportunities for the people and organizations that shape culture and inspire the world.  The trailblazer of the agency business, CAA was the first to build a sports business, create an investment bank, launch a venture fund, found technology start-up companies, establish a philanthropic arm, build a business in China, and form a brand marketing services division, among other innovations. Named Most Valuable Sports Agency by Forbes for nine consecutive years, CAA represents more than 2,000 of the world‚Äôs top athletes in football, baseball, basketball, hockey, soccer, in addition to coaches, on-air broadcasters, and sports personalities and works in the areas of broadcast rights, corporate marketing initiatives, social impact, and sports properties for sales and sponsorship opportunities.  Founded in 1975, CAA is headquartered in Los Angeles, and has offices in New York, Nashville, Memphis, Chicago, Miami, London, Munich, Geneva, Stockholm, Shanghai, and Beijing, among other locations globally.  For more information, please visit www.caa.com.

personTitleDescription:
FPC (F-O-R-T-U-N-E Personnel Consultants) is a network of over 65 executive search offices operated by industry specialists.  Each office brings a unique expertise, backed by robust corporate systems, infrastructure and training.  Since 1959, thousands of clients nationwide have put their trust in the quality, experience and integrity of FPC‚Äôs network of recruiters.  You‚Äôll work with experts who understand your specific challenges and the business conditions and talent availability in your market. Because of our presence in your market, we know where the best people are currently working and can reach out to passive candidates on your behalf.

FPC is an entrepreneurial enterprise, giving each office the flexibility to develop individual models for success within the network structure. FPC owners select the industries and disciplines in which they focus and receive support in addressing business and operational issues.

This level of professional support, combined with individual ownership, creates the best of both worlds for FPC clients and candidates. FPC offices are operated by industry specialists who bring their own unique expertise and contacts, and backed by systems, infrastructure and training.

Today, the company is led by CEO, Ron Herzog and President, Jeff Herzog. Since joining FPC in January 1995, Ron has developed an extensive knowledge of the recruitment industry as well as the intricacies of the FPC system. In addition to providing his vision for the company, he oversees the day-to-day operations for the FPC system nationwide and has developed a comprehensive training program that is a template for success. He works personally with each office, in collaboration with FPC‚Äôs New York-based training team, to maximize system productivity. Jeff works closely with existing and new franchisees and their consultants to drive innovation, revenue growth and profitability.
personSummary:
Jeff Herzog is a franchise leader and executive search professional with over 25 years of experience in the industry. He is the President of FPC National, a network of over 60 executive search offices operated by industry specialists, and the Owner/Executive Recruiter of FPC of New York City, a firm that specializes in placing supply chain, finance/accounting, and sales marketing professionals in select manufacturing companies around the country.

He is also an author and keynote speaker who shares his insights and expertise on how to start and grow a successful executive search business, leverage the skills and contacts from a corporate career, and match the best talent with the best opportunities. He is passionate about helping motivated business professionals create their own professional future and achieve their goals. He believes that the ability to combine talent with opportunity is paramount to the success and growth of any organization.

As the founder of Level-C Solutions, Brad designed and built the firm to help business owners of small to mid-market businesses solve their people problems, avoid some of the challenges he has faced firsthand, and find the right talent for their teams going forward.  In addition to Level-C Solutions, for over 10 years Brad has been working with Signature Back Office in a fractional new business development mode to help recruiting and staffing firm owners develop the best strategy for growing their business profitably.  

To give you a little background - during his career Brad pioneered a pro-active staffing service vs. the traditional reactive temporary help approach and took a start-up branch for one of the national companies in the industry to number one in the company in 18 months.  He was then recruited away to a competitor to manage the DFW Region and successfully led a turnaround effort and turned 10 years of losses to profitability within 2 ¬Ω years.   

Then Brad started Staffing Services, Inc. from the kitchen table and built it to become one of the Top 25 firms in the Dallas / Ft. Worth market with 4 locations plus an expansion to Denver.  At its peak SSI had 500 people out on assignment every day until 911 changed the world causing him to shut down his operations.  That is when he started his current business model originally as Staffing Alliances and re-branded the firm in 2009 to be Level-C Solutions as it is today.  Giving us a great deal of flexibility - Level-C Solutions works with and represents multiple executive search firms, independent recruiters, staffing agencies, back-office solutions, human resource professionals, and other services providers tied into the people part of business to execute and implement the solutions designed for the end client.

With over 30 years of business ownership, staffing and recruiting, and C-Level experience - once we understand the direction you want to take your business and the challenges you face we will know if we can help you solve some of your problems. And if we don‚Äôt have the solution, we usually know who does and will happily point you in that direction. 

Our Core Services Include:

*Strategic Planning for Growth
*Profitability Analysis
*Sales Coaching & Marketing Solutions
*Back Office/Employer of Record and PEO Services
*Executive Search, Recruiting Process Outsourcing & Staffing Services

For details about our services visit www.levelcsolutions.com
companyDescription:
Purpose:
At Level-C Solutions, we help business owners Solve Their People Problems, Strategic Growth, & Profitability.

"Hiring people is expensive. Hiring the wrong people is more expensive. Starting over is incredibly expensive."  - by Max Toy

We represent and work with multiple trusted recruiting and staffing firms as an independent agent to identify qualified candidates who fit the client company's culture.  At Level-C Solutions, we have developed and applied an Independent Agent concept to the services industry.  This approach gives us a completely different level of flexibility and the ability to help implement alternative solutions chosen.  

Once the job description is clarified and the candidate profile is determined - we broker the deal, engage the service providers, and oversee the services delivered.  Then we help our client decide the best way to engage those candidates to bring to their team. Options include Direct Hire, Temp-to-Hire, Interim / Fractional Assignments, or Contract Staffing Engagement. 

Supporting services include Signature‚Äôs Back Office/Employer of Record Solutions, Amazech Solutions for IT applications development and staff augmentation, plus Multiple recruiting and search service relationships throughout the country for special hard-to-fill positions. 

Level-C Solutions supports the management and leadership of companies by working in an External COO consulting manner - looking at the business needs from the client's side of the table.   We are designed to serve as a compliment to the Ownership and/or the Internal Management Team‚Ä¶giving you time to focus on your key objectives and opportunities while we help fill in the gaps  during times of constantly changing business conditions.  

Part of our mission is to help recruiting and staffing firms grow their business, so they will be here to help companies find the right people to fill their needs on an ongoing basis.

personSummary:
Experienced Staffing and Franchise Executive with over 35 years experience in the Staffing and Franchise industry. Spent 14 years in a Senior Executive role developing and growing an Atlanta based Staffing organization's Franchise program to $200MM. 

Owned and operated a Staffing Consulting business for many years assisting with start-ups and developing franchise programs as expansion vehicles for organizations throughout the country. Consulted for companies such as SelecSource, People 2.0, Welcomemat, and Stafftime.  During this time, I began my experience with acquisitions by successfully managing an acquisition and performing diligence of a $55m specialized healthcare staffing company for a Westcoast strategic buyer.  Through another consulting assignment, I was recruited to become President of a Cincinnati based commercial staffing company where, through acquisitions and organic growth, I led the Cincinnati company to record growth before divestiture. 

I later partnered with Silver Oak Services Partners PE to acquire a $35m Cleveland Ohio based skill trades staffing company where, as CEO, we successfully completed three tuck-in acquisitions and the expansion into 9 new markets through de novo offices.  I led the organization to $100m Revenue and triple the EBITDA over a 3-year period. This ultimately led to a lucrative sale of the company.

Establishing a reputation as an aggressive growth leader and a change management specialist, I have developed relationships with numerous Private Equity firms and have been hired by some of these firms on an interim basis to lead and restructure underperforming portfolio companies.  At the beginning of 2019, I was retained for a four-month assignment to evaluate and restructure a $70m healthcare staffing organization to maximize valuation for a sale.  Most recently, I was retained by a PE firm for an ten-month interim CEO role in order to restructure and turnaround a highly underperforming $50m mechanical company with the goal to position the organization for sale to a potential strategic buyer.
 
Upon completion of this project, I joined Great Range Capital, a midwestern PE firm, as the CEO of one of their portfolio companies called Labor Source, LLC.  Labor Source, LLC operates under the names One Source Staffing and Catstaff which specialize in the restoration and emergency response staffing sector.

Additionally, I sit on the board of directors of two other staffing organizations.

 Mr Davis previously  was on the Executive Committee Egon Zehnder leading its operations. Prior to that Mr Davis lead its US operations and founded its Boston Office over 20 years ago. personSummary:
samstaff is a different kind of staffing company. When we dreamed of our new business, we had a goal for our people: work where you find purpose and make a difference. We believe we can transform our industry for the better by how we attract, engage and delight our colleagues and clients. With over 60 years of healthcare staffing experience, we've come together to create a company that leverages our passion and purpose to make an impact in healthcare.  

We are obsessive about creating great experiences for our clients and colleagues. Our team is dedicated to recruiting amazing people who help our clients achieve their goals. Healthcare staffing is rewarding work in an industry with a higher purpose and we are grateful to make a difference in people‚Äôs lives. We do this by focusing on great people and their dreams. And we enjoy doing it!

samstaff is comprised of candidate advocates, client advisors, client compliance partners, colleagues with experience in HIM Coding, Cancer and Trauma Registry, Clinical Documentation Improvement Specialists, Interim Hospital Leadership and Case Management - all working together to create a comprehensive and cohesive solution for our clients, while remembering people are the most important part of our process.   

This is our story. And we simply cannot imagine any other way to spend the time we have, then making an impact in healthcare and changing the face of staffing.   The method behind our madness is an exceedingly simple one: use good judgement, create mutual trust, and exceed our client‚Äôs confidence in our abilities to find and match the right colleague to their opportunity.  Ready to experience something different?

Where we excel:
‚Ä¢	Interim Management
‚Ä¢	Physician Placement
‚Ä¢	Health Information Management Coding
‚Ä¢	Cancer Registry
‚Ä¢	Trauma Registry
‚Ä¢	Clinical Documentation Integrity

Contact us!  If we are not yet connected, please feel free to send me an invitation and tell me about yourself!   If you want to learn more about our staffing & placement services, please contact me directly at sam@samstaff.com

personTitleDescription:
Working with the right recruiter during your career transition is important. Elevate Healthcare Consultants provides you access to the industry‚Äôs leading talent to consult you during this important time. Our recruiters average more than five years in the industry meaning that working with Elevate will represent the best use of your time.We understand the opportunities we represent before we present them to you. In fact, in almost every case, we have spent several days with the clients we represent understanding all aspects of the opportunity and location. Our tenure in this field proves invaluable when it comes to discussions surrounding: compensation, fellowships, certifications, and considerations in regards to cost of living adjustments.

Matt has worked in the healthcare recruitment industry for over 10 years now. He has held titles of Principal Recruiter, Principal Marketer, Director of Recruiting, Director of Marketing, Senior Director of Permanent Placement and Vice President. He is a member of both NALTO and NAPR, where he participates by being a member of the Education Committee. 

Matt graduated from Baylor University with a degree in Health Promotion Science, and earned a Master of Science. While attending Baylor University he was a strength and conditioning coach for all Baylor Sports, and a player on the national champion men‚Äôs rugby club. Matt resides in Plano, TX with his wife Jessica, two daughters, and son. He enjoys spending time with his family, coaching his kids‚Äô sports teams, working out and is a member of St. Elizabeth Ann-Seton Church in Plano, TX.
personSummary:
As the Executive Vice President and Founding Partner of Elevate Healthcare Consultants, LLC, I leverage my extensive experience and expertise in healthcare recruitment to help clients and candidates achieve their goals. I have been in this industry for over 20 years, and I have successfully placed hundreds of physicians, advanced practitioners, dentists, and executives across the country.

My passion for coaching and fitness, which I developed as a Strength and Conditioning Coach at Baylor University and a Fitness Manager at 24 Hour Fitness, drives me to train and mentor other recruiters, as well as consult with various leaders in healthcare on how to optimize their performance, revenue, and satisfaction. I enjoy having the opportunity to impact others in a positive way, and to compete and win in a challenging and rewarding field.

personSummary:
Global Recruiters of Austin places top-quality candidates with the nation's best employers. We work nationally, conduct Contingent, Retained and Engaged searches and offer client companies and candidates integrity, personal attention, confidentiality and high professional standards. 

In short, we are very good at what we do.  Here's why:

‚Ä¢   We don‚Äôt post jobs or source resumes from job sites but rather ONLY CONDUCT CUSTOM, ACTIVE SEARCHES.  We collect detailed requirements for each search, reach out to 500-1000 candidates to kick off a search and submit only qualified candidates that are sincerely  interested in the opportunity.
‚Ä¢   We are the second largest recruiting firm in the US and leverage the databases of over 175 Global Recruiters Network offices to access over 1,000,000 candidates beyond LinkedIn, job boards, etc.
‚Ä¢   Our average time to submit fully qualified candidates is 4 days.
‚Ä¢   98% of all candidates submitted are interviewed.
‚Ä¢   96% of all candidates we've placed have stayed with their new employer longer than 1 year; 84% longer than 3 years.

‚Ä¢   We're a veteran owned small business with a vast network of ex-military and civilian potential candidates.  We have worked with many Service Academy and veteran hiring managers and candidates to fill challenging positions.

Finally, we accomplish this through our unique ability to create partnerships with both our corporate clients and our candidates.  At Global Recruiters of Austin we work tirelessly to exceed the expectations of both our clients and candidates.

Contact us at 512-266-2926 or pmahosky@grnaustin.com.

personTitleDescription:
The Steven Spectrum Career Project is a non-profit dedicated to providing workforce development and assisting neurodivergent individuals in finding employment opportunities. We focus on empowering neurodivergent talent to succeed in the professional world. Through innovative programs and partnerships, we educate employers on creating a supportive work culture while also engaging in community outreach and advocacy efforts to educate on misconceptions and reduce stigmas surrounding neurodivergent individuals in the workforce. As the founder, my role entails, but is not limited to:

- Developing and leading strategic initiatives to provide workforce development for neurodivergent individuals.

- Building partnerships with employers and community organizations to create collaborative opportunities for neurodivergent talent.

- Educating employers on creating inclusive and supportive work environments.

- Leading community outreach programs to advocate for neurodivergent individuals.

- Recruiting, hiring, managing, and training volunteers to support program goals and initiatives.

- Overseeing day-to-day operations, fundraising, and program development to ensure the success of the initiative.

- Spearheading advocacy efforts to raise awareness and educate on misconceptions and reduce stigmas about neurodivergent individuals in the workforce.

personSummary:
As Chief Solutions Officer at Sevenstep, I lead our efforts to assess, curate, and develop leading-edge products and solutions for our talent acquisition clients. This includes the continued advancement of our technology stack and analytics platform, Sevayo.  

Sevenstep is known for successfully guiding organizations as they unleash the power and possibility of talent. We deliver proven and sustainable solutions built on innovative strategic thinking, shaped by global insights, and powered by fearless leadership to achieve operational excellence. Sevenstep delivers true business outcomes with every hire. We are annually ranked as a top enterprise RPO provider on HRO Today‚Äôs Baker‚Äôs Dozen list and help our clients succeed by bringing an unbounded vision and partnership-driven approach to every engagement.

I thrive on meaningful connection, straight-forward communication, and getting the job done. That‚Äôs why I started ‚Äì HealthCare Talent and Workforce Solutions Group ‚Äì to provide a new kind of talent acquisition and workforce strategy model to the marketplace. My passion for creating connections and opportunities in the healthcare industry is why we‚Äôre always looking for new ways to innovate, serve our clients, build talent communities, and connect great people.  

Our approach centers around solutions that are designed to align a client‚Äôs business and workforce. Maximum value is driven by providing high quality services, creative solutions and rapid execution. 

It is critical, in today‚Äôs hyper competitive employment market, that organizations develop like partnerships with companies that are 100% committed to identifying top talent exclusively for them versus attempting to cast a wide net and service everyone in a given market. 

That‚Äôs what sets us apart for our competitors, we build programs that are exclusive to our client base rather than attempting to be a me too!

Twenty-five years‚Äô experience in management, sales, operations, and marketing ‚Äì with two decades devoted to human capital consulting for Fortune 1000 companies ‚Äì across a range of industries allows me to quickly identify gaps and create solutions that addresses each client‚Äôs  unique needs. 

We use a novel approach to help our healthcare clients get qualified talent in an industry struggling to find skilled workers. Our One Placement ‚Äì One Scholarship program is a collaborative partnership with healthcare clients and local educational institutions designed to train people with necessary skills, and then get them to work where they‚Äôre most needed to fill critical vacancies. companyDescription:
Welcome to OmniForce Solutions, a trusted partner in talent solutions! Driven by our guiding principle, "Always do the right thing," we pride ourselves on making connections between exceptional talent and our client‚Äôs unique needs. 

As one of the fastest-growing companies in the country, our pursuit of excellence, innovation, and growth is relentless. With a comprehensive portfolio of services, we're positioned to deliver customized solutions for organizations of all sizes, covering roles from analysts, technologists, customer engagement specialists, supply chain experts, and accountants to mechanics, machinists, technicians, and operators. 

Our Services
1. Temporary and Contract: Ideal for managing variable workloads, special projects, seasonal peaks, and interim needs such as leaves of absence.
2. Contract-to-Hire: This blend of temporary and direct hire allows both clients and talent to experience the arrangement before making a long-term commitment.
3. Direct Hire: We manage the recruitment and hiring process end-to-end, but once an offer is accepted, the candidate transitions directly onto our client's payroll.
4. Payroll Services: We streamline your operations by handling paycheck distribution, tax withholding, workers' compensation, and benefits, enabling you to focus on your core business.

Industry Expertise
Our expertise spans various sectors of the market, including Energy and Power, Oil and Gas, Manufacturing, Consulting and Business Services, Telecommunications, Aerospace, and Financial Services. This industry knowledge, combined with our comprehensive recruitment processes, enables us to source the best talent tailored to specific industry requirements and business needs.

For more insights about OmniForce and to explore how we can contribute to your business success, please visit our website, or get in touch with us directly.

All Med Search is a key player in the direct-hire placement of American, Canadian and international healthcare professionals at healthcare organizations across the USA. The company's success is attributed to the expertise of its founder, Nadia Gruzd. Recognized among the top 75 recruiters nationally, and as California's staffing professional of the year, Gruzd‚Äôs vision and dedication have been instrumental in shaping the company's reputation.

Our focus is not just about addressing today's healthcare staffing needs; it's about combating the national healthcare professional shortage and enhancing the lives of nurses and allied health professionals worldwide. We strive to understand both employer and candidate needs deeply, ensuring the perfect match every time.

We offer a range of services including:
Canadian and International healthcare talent: Our expertise lies in meticulously selecting exceptional candidates who fulfill the benchmarks set by our client healthcare partners. As a company founded by U.S. immigrants, we understand the complexities of making such a significant transition. Our team is proficient in every facet of the immigration process, committed to providing comprehensive support to our candidates at every step. 
Vendor Management Solution: Custom solutions for managing contingent workforces.
Engagement and Retention Program: Strategies focused on employee engagement and retention, crucial for patient care quality and organizational strength.

Choosing All Med Search means partnering with a company that brands your organization distinctively, provides competitive intelligence, and aligns recruitment processes with your ongoing strategic growth. Our expertise, scalability, and on-demand support equip you to meet the most challenging and unpredictable recruitment demands.

We are your partner in making a global difference in healthcare staffing. Join us in our mission to create a more robust and efficient healthcare system, one placement at a time.
personSummary:
Nadia Gruzd is one of the nations top global healthcare talent acquisition and recruiting experts.  Her expertise enables her to work with hiring managers to help healthcare organizations develop staffing strategies in order to achieve their business objectives.

Nadia has built a unique recruitment methodology based on what she has learned over the past 33 years and she teaches her methodology to in-house recruiters ‚Äì new and experienced ‚Äì to enable them to become more confident and professional and fill more direct hire vacancies in a shorter time frame, thereby producing the highest productivity at the lowest cost.

Nadia also teaches hiring managers how to hire, train and manage recruiters to ensure the best results for you and your team.

Nadia was inducted in the International Professional Business Woman's Hall of Fame for outstanding achievements in Human Resources, Recruitment and Personnel

 Nadia was awarded the honor of Woman of the Year by the American Biographical Institute & its Board of International Research

Nadia was selected for membership in the Pinnacle Society, a recruiting industry honor society recognizing the top 75 executive recruiters worldwide

Nadia received The National Association of Professional Business Women award that recognizes her excellence within the Healthcare Recruitment Industry

Nadia served on the Board of Directors of NAPS for 2 years. She is a Certified International Personnel Consultant and Certified Employee Retention Specialist.

personTitleDescription:
About Envireum
At Envireum, we specialize in helping companies grow beyond borders. Whether you're entering a new market, launching an overseas team, or need hard-to-find talent in unfamiliar regions, we offer agile staffing solutions tailored to your unique expansion goals. From strategic sourcing to full-service recruitment, our global talent network and regional insight make us the go-to partner for scaling companies ready to think‚Äîand hire‚Äîglobally. With Envireum, building the right team is no longer a barrier to international growth.

Beyond traditional contingency recruiting, we offer flexible solutions that support your in-house recruiting needs. If you need additional recruiting bandwidth to fill internal roles faster, our RPO (Recruitment Process Outsourcing) model can seamlessly plug into your workflows. When your recruiters need more qualified candidates, our Sourcing Support (SS) team delivers top-of-funnel sourcing at speed. Both services include experienced Recruiting or Sourcing Managers, powerful tools, and custom training to ensure results. With our support, clients see 50%+ productivity gains and up to 2x cost savings compared to conventional models.

personTitleDescription:
ORS Partners Focuses on Accelerating Client Growth
With growing a business, the focus needs to be centered around robust product development and developing a strong sales pipeline. During these times, effective talent acquisition processes aren‚Äôt always fully developed and talent acquisition solutions for small and emerging businesses tend to rely on personal referrals and the immediate network of employees and executives.

ORS Partners was founded in 2012 with a singular mission: Utilize innovative talent solutions to accelerate client growth. ORS Partners helps business leaders optimize their talent acquisition programs to support overall business growth.

ORS Talent Consultants provide support throughout the entire talent acquisition process, from sourcing and hiring to branding and marketing. They help clients interpret, simplify, and solve complex talent issues by developing and implementing strategies around people, processes, and technology.

Our vision is to create an integrated, seamless solution focused on the candidate journey and in which the employer and employee discover each other, every time.

Talent Solutions to Ensure a Perfect Fit
ORS Partners provides talent acquisition solutions to Venture/PE-backed, Emerging Growth, Mid-Market, and Fortune 1000 companies. We provide a full suite of talent solutions that can be scaled to seamlessly fit your business‚Äôs hiring needs. These include:

White Label Solutions
Retained Search Solutions
Project-Based Solutions
Contract Recruiting
personSummary:
Chris is the Senior Vice President of Business Development, driving all new revenue activity at ORS Partners working closely with the CEO, CRO, CFO, and SVP, Program Delivery. ORS Partners has enjoyed double digit growth over the last several years. Chris and his team are chartered with creating innovative  recruitment solutions focused on outsourced recruitment, white labeled recruitment solutions, retained search, and contingent staffing. From recruitment tools to superior account management, ORS Partners is poised to partner with you on growing your organization.

Chris most recently led a successful sales and partnership team at Scout Exchange, a leader in the AI/Machine Learning space managing an ecosystem of over 15,000 individual recruiters and over 500 clients.

Prior to Scout, Chris spent 20 years at ManpowerGroup Solutions, a pioneer in the global recruitment process outsourcing (RPO) space. Chris led the business development function for both North America and globally throughout his years at the leading global RPO provider. He was also the CEO of a search firm specializing in the healthcare space that he successfully sold in 1999 and started his career at Aerotek as one of its top billing recruiters in NYC in 1995.

Chris' experience focused on pragmatic solutions that can help a client in today's market but also paint a vision for the future. His subject matter expertise across the Venture Capital market and Fortune 1000 enterprise has foundations in RPO, MSP, contingent staffing, perm placement, and TTM (Total Talent Management) solutions.
companyDescription:

This differentiated offering allows ORS‚Äô clients to offload their recruiting function without jeopardizing the consistency in their employer brand ‚Äì a critical component to successful talent management.

To learn more about ORS Partners, please visit www.orspartners.com.

personSummary:
Liam Garrity believes one should never take a career opportunity for granted.  He instills this mindset in his candidates and strives to help them achieve professional success while assisting his clients in improving their operations and bottom lines. 

In 2018, Liam joined Lucas Group as a Senior Executive Search Consultant in the Sales & Marketing practice and was promoted to Senior Partner after 10 months and then to Senior Executive Partner within 16 months of joining Lucas Group.  Empathetic to the needs of the candidates with whom he works, he addresses his clients‚Äô hiring needs with high-level sales, sales/revenue operations and marketing talent, specifically within private equity, SaaS, employee benefits/insurance and financial services. Has run searches for CRO, SVP, Senior Managing Director and all mid-level management requirements as well.  Liam enjoys the challenge that comes with making strategic matches and diligently works to form synergistic partnerships that benefit both his clients and candidates. 

Liam‚Äôs career history prior to recruiting was in employee benefits.  As an outside sales representative, he finished in the top 10 percent of sales representatives 12 years in a row at Sun Life Financial and The Guardian Life Insurance Company of America.  Liam later transitioned to recruiting in 2017, working with a boutique executive search firm in the Atlanta market.  During this time, he honed and perfected his recruiting skills before moving to Lucas Group in 2018.  Liam‚Äôs experience in recruiting combined with his tenacity and persistence are the strong cornerstone of his continued success in the industry. 

Passionate about animal welfare, Liam is involved in the Atlanta Humane Society.  He also enjoys spending time with his dogs and family as well as golfing and watching sporting events.  Liam holds a degree in Business Administration ‚Äì Finance from the University of Georgia. 

Experienced Business Development Executive with a demonstrated history of working in Global Executive Searches with a focus on the professional services including C-level, SVP & 
VP levels for financial services and software companies. 15 plus years of experience selling/sales directly to the customer for both employee benefits/insurance and retained/contingent recruiting services. Skilled in Negotiation, Compensation Review, Executive Search and Team Building. Strong human resources professional with a Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) focused in Finance, General from University of Georgia - Terry College of Business.

personTitleDescription:
Toby Copeland ‚Äì Staffing Executive | Construction, Engineering & Architecture Talent Strategist

Toby Copeland is a veteran of the staffing industry with over 25 years of experience connecting high-impact professionals with top-tier employers across construction, engineering, and architecture. Known for his strategic vision and passion for people, Toby has built a career helping individuals discover their dream careers and guiding companies to the leadership talent that drives success.

In 2004, Toby founded Impact Solutions, a specialized staffing firm focused on Technology, Biotechnology, and Infrastructure. Under his leadership, the company earned a reputation for excellence and innovation in talent delivery. In 2017, Impact Solutions was acquired by Trillium Construction, a national leader in skilled trades and professional staffing.

Following the acquisition, Toby took on a critical leadership role within Trillium, overseeing operations across the western United States. He successfully launched multiple new offices and played a pivotal role in the 2023 integration of Seattle-based American Tradesmen into the Trillium network.

Toby‚Äôs expertise spans every facet of staffing, including contingent, strategic, retained, and contract hires. He is a trusted advisor to construction firms looking to build out high-performing teams, especially in leadership roles where the stakes are highest.

In today‚Äôs fast-paced and complex construction environment, the demand for strong, visionary leaders has never been more critical. Large-scale projects hinge on leadership that can drive performance, mitigate risk, and deliver results on time and on budget.

Toby Copeland is the right person to lead our talented team of recruiters who identify and place these critical roles‚Äîensuring Trillium‚Äôs clients stay ahead of schedule, ahead of budget, and ahead of the competition.

About Concord Summit Capital LLC:
Concord Summit Capital (CSCap) is a nationwide premier intermediary between sponsors and providers of capital in commercial real estate transactions. personSummary:
Through my career and as an avid supporter of the arts, I‚Äôm familiar with the rarity of talent, that critical attribute that fuels exemplary performance in business and culture.  Early exposure to those of diverse backgrounds sparked a curiosity and desire to help fulfill the career aspirations of others.  The process of identifying and aligning talent in ways that change lives drives the vision of our organization. 

Aleron is a leader in talent workforce management and outsourcing services. Our brands include Acara Solutions, Broadleaf Results, Lume Strategies, SDI and Viaduct.  Our teams and affiliates work throughout the United States, Canada, Mexico and 10 other countries in Asia, EMEA and South America. 

Talent acquisition is much more comprehensive a task than the word ‚Äústaffing‚Äù implies. My goal for Aleron is to serve as a thought-leader in the talent business.  Founded in 1957, we focus on the agile delivery of people, process, and project outsourcing solutions.  Our talent solutions deliver qualified talent through staff augmentation, direct placement services, and executive recruitment.  Our proactive process solutions include managed service programs, recruitment process outsourcing, vendor management systems, independent contractor compliance programs, and supply chain management. Finally, our project outsourcing services include the management and delivery of CAD services, equipment training, IT services, and HR projects.

What differentiates Aleron‚Äôs services is our emphasis on soft skills, behavioral traits, and cultural fit in all we do.  In an often commoditized industry, we remain patient and focused on delivering exceptional service to customers in need.

The talent landscape continues to evolve.  With these changes in mind, my aim is to focus our talent-delivery skills on definable goals and provide tailored solutions that are innovative and bold, mirroring the direct, fair, driven, and tenacious approach I‚Äôve prioritized throughout my career.

personSummary: Senior executive and board member who brings more than 25 years of successful executive leadership experience to Pinnacle Search Partners. Originally hired as a consultant to the firm in 2014, quickly assumed roles of continuing responsibility and now serves as President. Bill has spent his career building organizations and helping others find the right individuals to enhance their teams. His passion has always been helping excellent candidates and top organizations find each other, and he works tirelessly to that end. Bill has a vast network and a depth of business knowledge that enables him to support the success of his candidates, clients and the Pinnacle team. Bill is well versed in the nuances of public, private and private equity organizations. In his prior role as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Simmons Bedding Company, he worked with three different private equity sponsor groups. Prior to that, he was Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of publicly-traded LADD Furniture. His earlier years were spent with Big 4 global accounting firm KPMG where he was ultimately named Partner and held responsibilities in the United States and Ireland. Bill is a graduate of The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, and he is a CPA. Bill is a member of the board of directors of Party City Holdco Inc. (NYSE) and Flexsteel Industries, Inc. (NASDAQ). He also has served on a number of private company Advisory Boards, is a member of the President‚Äôs Advisory Council at Elon University, is on the American Home Furnishings Alliance Solution Partners board, and is Chair of the Statistics Committee of the International Sleep Products Association.

personTitleDescription:
Rise Search Partners, a proud Woman-owned business, stands as a beacon of excellence in the realm of executive search. Our mission at Rise Search Partners is to transcend conventional standards and uplift exceptional leadership, forging connections that extend far beyond the present. With a commitment to providing exemplary service, we dedicate ourselves to fostering meaningful relationships with both clients and executives across the nation.

As specialists in the art of identifying and securing top-tier executive talent, we empower organizations to innovate, drive growth, and achieve lasting success. Our comprehensive approach spans across industries, ensuring that we cater to the diverse needs of our clients. From strategic C-Suite placements to key Board Members, Advisors, SVPs, VPs, Directors, Managers, and Associates, our focus is on roles at the managerial level and above.

What sets Rise Search Partners apart is our unwavering commitment to excellence, manifested through a personalized and thorough approach to every executive search. We pride ourselves on our industry insights, keeping us at the forefront of the ever-evolving landscape. As your trusted partner in executive search, we are a full-service firm ready to guide organizations toward transformative leadership solutions. Elevate your executive team with Rise Search Partners, where innovation, growth, and success converge.
personSummary:
As the Founder and CEO of Rise Search Partners, I have a demonstrated career path with strong dynamic leadership and expertise in the realm of IT staffing, consulting, and executive search. 

My journey in the professional world began with a focus on IT staffing and recruiting, where I honed my skills in identifying and placing top-tier talent within the information technology sector. This early experience taught me a deep understanding of the industry's intricacies, building relationships, company cultures, and the ability to match candidates with the right roles. As my experience grew deeper, as did my executive relationships.

The pivotal moment in my career came with the establishment of Rise Search Partners, an Executive Search firm. As the driving force behind the company, I am guiding its inception and shaping its mission. What sets Rise Search Partners apart is our unwavering commitment to excellence, manifested through a personalized and thorough approach to every executive search. We pride ourselves on our industry insights, keeping us at the forefront of the ever-evolving landscape. As your trusted partner in executive search, we pride ourselves on our client customer service values. We are a full-service firm ready to guide organizations toward transformative leadership solutions. Elevate your executive team with Rise Search Partners, where innovation, growth, and success converge.

In my current capacity as Founder and CEO, I am not only steering the ship but also embody the values and principles that define Rise Search Partners. My leadership style is marked by innovation, adaptability, and a relentless pursuit of excellence. As head of the firm, I personally speak with every client and every candidate to ensure a perfect match.

Accounting ¬∑ Corporate Services ¬∑ Digital ¬∑ Engineering ¬∑ Financial Services ¬∑ Front Office ¬∑ Healthcare ¬∑ Hospitality ¬∑ Human Resources ¬∑ Legal ¬∑ Manufacturing ¬∑ Marketing ¬∑ Office Support ¬∑ Real Estate ¬∑ Technology

In addition to my role at TBG, I‚Äôm a Founding Partner at Jackson Lucas, a retained executive search firm focused on strategic leadership recruitment across Real Estate, Financial Services, FinTech, Construction & Engineering, Private Equity, Asset Management, Alternatives, Venture Capital, and Legal.

At Jackson Lucas, our mission is to help organizations maximize value and drive long-term growth by aligning talent with business strategy. We partner with clients during critical inflection points ‚Äî whether expanding into new markets, preparing for succession, or building executive teams capable of leading through change.

personSummary:
In 1988 with the late Stanley Rogers, Michael co-founded the firm to specialize in executive search for financial, legal, human resource and general management professionals. Today Michael serves as managing partner. His responsibilities include the daily operations of the firm, staff and business development, and managing searches in the consumer products, retail, media and entertainment industries.

In 2016 Michael, along with John Riley, founded Koren Riley Real Estate & Property Management Staffing. KRRE is an international staffing firm specializing in the Manufactured Home Industry (MHI) and Apartment Complexes throughout the United States & Canada. 

In 2007, Michael started the firm's Business Advisory division to represent privately owned Manufacturing companies with a minimum $5mm EBITDA in their efforts to be sold, acquired or merged. To date, Koren Rogers Business Advisors has successfully closed deals valued at over $110mm.

Michael was the founder and president of Partnership for a Better Westchester, a 501c-3 organization that focused on charitable efforts throughout Westchester County. The PBW has donated over $500K to Blythedale Children's Hospital among their various fundraising efforts. 

Michael also served as a volunteer teacher for Junior Achievement of the lower Hudson Valley.

In 2005, Michael was the founder, manager and current member of the very successful Grateful Dead Tribute band, Not DEAD Yet--he's the "Bobby" guy. He is also the founder, manager and member of Blonde Ambition, a party rock & dance band appealing to the "Yin and Yang" The band websites are www.notdeadyet.com & www.blondeambitionrock.com
companyDescription: Koren Riley is constantly evolving to meet the ever-changing needs of the Multifamily, Manufactured Housing, RV Communities, and Commercial industries, but we never lose sight of what our clients and candidates have long valued us for: personalized services, trusted relationships, and in-depth knowledge of the job market.  Throughout the years, our culture and core values have helped us build a company with many talented employees in offices nationwide.  We are fully invested in our client‚Äôs success, and we understand great relationships don‚Äôt just happen ‚Äì they‚Äôre cultivated!

personSummary:
Rose Steinberg is the Founder & CEO of People Obsessed, a boutique talent agency focused on human-centered recruitment and talent advisory services. 

She comes to the talent industry after a long career leading sales operations, client success, and ad tech teams at large brands, mid-market players, and start-ups in the US and Asia. Her emphasis and passion for building teams and growing talent throughout her career are today's basis for her work. 

At People Obsessed, Steinberg has built a deeply personalized talent practice that partners with diverse businesses by offering a blend of bespoke talent, recruiting, and related advisory work. Marketing agencies and technology firms often seek out Steinberg in all growth stages to help them hand-select leadership for key executive positions, build market-facing departments, or help with rapid hiring during a critical growth phase.   

Steinberg aims to drive prosperous business and interpersonal outcomes through People Obsessed‚Äôs services by matching the finest talent with companies committed to excelling employees. Simultaneously, Steinberg has created a talent acquisition process that enables candidates to realize their greatest professional success by making preeminent, curated moves.

Creating long-term, mutually beneficial relationships is one of Steinberg‚Äôs superpowers. Many of her clients, employees, and candidates are people she has worked with throughout her career. Maintaining and nurturing this network means only making introductions and matches that fit both parties and produce excellent outcomes. Ensuring that the talent acquisition experience is enjoyable and drives mutual value is a point of pride for Steinberg. 

After living in San Diego, San Francisco, and Hong Kong, Steinberg is happily a committed resident of New York City. If you ever get tired of talking to her about work, Steinberg is always ready to talk about NYC‚Äôs highlights, far-flung trips, fitness and wellness, or the antics of her rescue cats.

personTitleDescription:
At NextDeavor, we set out to modernize recruiting, not by replacing people with tech, but by empowering them through it.

I led the company from bootstrapped beginnings to a tech-enabled recruiting firm that delivers AI-powered talent solutions with a human-first approach. In 2025, we were acquired by Pioneers to scale our mission even further.

Highlights:

Built and scaled a recruiting platform that combines AI automation (job matching, outreach, candidate prioritization) with personalized recruiter workflows.

Enabled 24/7 recruiting workflows that sourced, matched, and initiated outreach on jobs posted after hours, turning hours into minutes.

Helped clients optimize for IPO-readiness through workforce planning, compliance, and strategic hiring.

Delivered over $20M in placements across tech, engineering, HR, and marketing functions.

Reimagined contingent workforce models and embedded talent solutions to drive real-time scalability and hiring velocity.

Integrated product-led growth strategy by aligning tech tools with recruiting performance and measurable outcomes.

NextDeavor continues to support companies navigating the future of work, with a focus on blending empathy, speed, and insight in every hire.
personSummary:
I build companies by building people first.

At the core of my journey is one belief: technology should enhance human connection, not replace it. That‚Äôs why at NextDeavor (now part of Pioneers), we‚Äôve built a recruiting engine that puts people at the center ‚Äî powered by AI, but driven by empathy, strategy, and experience.

Our platform blends AI-driven job matching, intelligent outreach, and automation with real, human-led conversations, giving companies speed, precision, and personalization all at once. We've eliminated friction in hiring, scaled sourcing overnight, and freed recruiters to do what they do best: connect.

After 15+ years in the staffing and talent space, I‚Äôve seen the industry evolve, and I‚Äôve helped it evolve. From contingency search to full-cycle AI workflows, I‚Äôm focused on solving the most human problems in hiring with the best technology available. Whether you're scaling a team, preparing for IPO, or reimagining your workforce, I believe there‚Äôs a better way to grow.

Let‚Äôs make hiring more human, and smarter.
companyDescription:
At NextDeavor, we believe hiring is more than filling seats, it‚Äôs about building aligned, high-performing teams that drive real business outcomes.

We are a human-first, AI-powered recruiting firm that blends cutting-edge automation with deep relationship-based recruiting. Our proprietary platform enhances every stage of the hiring journey, from intelligent sourcing and matching to personalized outreach and real-time candidate insights, so our recruiters can do what they do best: connect with people.

Since 2015, we‚Äôve helped startups to enterprise companies scale their teams across tech, engineering, marketing, HR, and operations. Whether it‚Äôs contingent workforce solutions, direct-hire placements, or embedded recruiting partnerships, we bring speed, strategy, and soul to talent acquisition.

NextDeavor was acquired by Pioneers in 2025, accelerating our vision to build the most efficient, scalable, and human recruiting platform in the industry.

Let‚Äôs build the future of hiring ‚Äî together.

Summit Search Solutions is an executive search firm serving the higher education, nonprofit and K-12 sectors.  
 
Summit offers high quality search services that give clients unprecedented choice, flexibility, and quality.  In addition to comprehensive search, Summit provides service options that allow clients to unbundle the search process and pay for component pieces.  Summit makes special efforts to provide robust and diverse candidate slates for all the searches we lead.
 
Comprehensive Model
 
Our comprehensive service provides unparalleled focus and attention on your project from start to finish.  This service includes onsite or virtual listening sessions, prospect research, diversity sourcing strategies, outreach/recruiting, candidate assessment, candidate management, as well as comprehensive reference and background checking and onboarding planning. This model involves meetings with key organizational leadership and identified stakeholder groups throughout the process. This model offers a full guarantee.
 
Sourcing Services Model
 
Summit‚Äôs sourcing-based models enable clients to purchase pieces of the search process in situations where a comprehensive search is not feasible or desired. Services can include prospect research, marketing the job, attracting a high quality and diverse candidate slate, and working with the client to select which candidates to pursue.  Clients who choose this model are often seeking recruitment sourcing to support their own recruiting efforts.  
 
Customized services.  Specialized expertise.  Results.  Flexibility. This is what Summit is about!
 
Offices in California, Colorado, Kansas, Maryland, New York, and North Carolina.

personSummary:
Empowerment Access Foundation is a Florida-based 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization that exists to break cycles of exploitation, trauma, and generational adversity by restoring access to healing, safety, and self-determined futures for survivors of human trafficking and other forms of violence. We work alongside youth and adults, especially those impacted by trafficking, foster care, abuse, and systemic marginalization, to create pathways to resilience through trauma-informed care, crisis intervention, advocacy, education, and community collaboration.
We believe that every individual‚Äîregardless of their past‚Äîdeserves the opportunity to reclaim their voice, rebuild their life, and thrive in a world that recognizes their inherent worth. Our mission is not only to intervene in crises but to transform systems and narratives that perpetuate vulnerability, offering access to empowerment where barriers once stood.
EAF is committed to restoring hope and creating pathways of healing for children and adults who have experienced severe trauma and abuse. EAF provides direct support services such as emergency housing, trauma-informed case management, vocational access, financial assistance, access to medical, dental and vision services and enrichment opportunities.
Our work centers around the belief that every individual deserves to feel seen, safe, and supported. Our services currently extend across Florida, with program expansion underway in Central Florida.
In our first year, we launched an Emergency Backpack and Dignity Bag program with law enforcement partners, built survivor-centered service pipelines to access medical, vision and dental care, and began preparing a series of fundraising and community education events to deepen our impact.

EAF envisions a world where survivors are no longer defined by their trauma but empowered by their strength; where systems serve with compassion, and where every person has equitable access to healing, justice, and opportunity. EAF seeks to be a bridge‚Äîbetween crisis and stability, between surviving and thriving‚Äîrestoring power to those who have been silenced, overlooked, or discarded.
We envision communities that are trauma-informed, survivor-led, and rooted in equity‚Äîwhere lived experience is honored as expertise, and where all youth and adults have access to the tools, relationships, and support they need to flourish.

EAF seeks to partner with community-minded organizations like Universal Orlando to raise critical funds while sharing the message that children and survivors are not alone in their recovery journey.
